analyzed: gal te de dag la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir skyon med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no error because they are not different,

original: ae ma'o lan med par skyon dka' zhing dog pa khyed lta ba la zhen pas 'jug pas kyang bdag nyid yang dag par rig pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: ae ma'o lan med par skyon dka' zhing dog pa khyed lta ba la zhen pas 'jug pas kyang bdag nyid yang dag par rig pa med pa yin no //
translated: alas, you are attached to your view, and you are unable to respond to the criticism.

original: tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba ni gcig nyid yin la de dag ces bya ba tha dad pa brten pa ni yod pa'i tha snyad yin no ;üîΩ/ ldog pa dang rab tu skye ba dag la /
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba ni gcig nyid yin la de dag ces bya ba tha dad pa brten pa ni yod pa'i tha snyad yin no ; / ldog pa dang rab tu skye ba dag la /
translated: ‚ÄúNondifference‚Äù is the same as ‚Äúsameness,‚Äù and ‚Äúthose‚Äù is a different term for the basis.

original: ldog pa med pa dang / rab tu skye ba med pa dag gi gnas pa dang mi gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid ji ltar na rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa med pa dang / rab tu skye ba med pa dag gi gnas pa dang mi gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid ji ltar na rigs pa yin te /
translated: How could it be logical to say that the various natures of ‚Äúnoncessation‚Äù and ‚Äúnonarising‚Äù are ‚Äúenduring‚Äù and ‚Äúnot enduring,‚Äù etc.?

original: de dag ni dngos po rnams kyi tha dad pa dang / de dag dang bral ba ni tha dad pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag ni dngos po rnams kyi tha dad pa dang / de dag dang bral ba ni tha dad pa med pa yin te /
translated: Because those are the differences of things, and being free from those is nondifference.

original: dper na bde ba la sogs pa dang / nus pa'i gnas skabs dag bdag nyid gcig pa lta bu yin la /
analyzed: dper na bde ba la sogs pa dang / nus pa'i gnas skabs dag bdag nyid gcig pa lta bu yin la /
translated: For example, it is like the case of pleasure, etc., and the capacity of the self being the same.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na ni tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir dang / tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa dag gi rnam par gzhag pa med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na ni tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir dang / tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa dag gi rnam par gzhag pa med par 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, because the characteristics of difference and nondifference would not exist, the presentations of difference and nondifference would not exist.

original: gal te de'i bdag nyid kyi rab tu @332b skye ba ni tha mi dad pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te de'i bdag nyid kyi rab tu @332b skye ba ni tha mi dad pa yin la /
translated: If the arising of something from itself is nondifferent,

original: de las bzlog pa dag ni tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa dag ni tha dad pa yin te /
translated: and the opposite of that is different,

original: dper na bum pa ni 'ji ba'i bdag nyid las skye ba de'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / bzlog pa tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: dper na bum pa ni 'ji ba'i bdag nyid las skye ba de'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / bzlog pa tha dad pa yin no //
translated: then, for example, a pot arises from the nature of clay, and therefore it is not different, and the opposite of that is different.üîΩOr, like pleasure and pain.

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal lta bu'o zhes bya ba 'di ni tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa de bas na 'gal ba med do zhe na /
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal lta bu'o zhes bya ba 'di ni tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa de bas na 'gal ba med do zhe na /
translated: This is the definition of different and nondifferent. Therefore there is no contradiction.

original: bum pa'i rab tu skye ba 'ji ba'i bdag nyid ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bum pa'i rab tu skye ba 'ji ba'i bdag nyid ma yin gyi /
translated: The arising of a pot is not the nature of clay,

original: 'on kyang 'ji ba'i bdag nyid 'ga' zhig bum pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'ji ba'i bdag nyid 'ga' zhig bum pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: but rather, some nature of clay is the essence of a pot.

original: 'jig rten gsum na 'ji ba'i bdag nyid gcig ma yin te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na 'ji ba'i bdag nyid gcig ma yin te /
translated: The nature of clay is not the same in the three worlds.

original: rnam par rig pa so sor snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir dang / gnas skabs tha dad pa dang so so'i don gyi bya ba tha dad pa'i sgo nas rdzas kyi rang bzhin tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rig pa so sor snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir dang / gnas skabs tha dad pa dang so so'i don gyi bya ba tha dad pa'i sgo nas rdzas kyi rang bzhin tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the different aspects of consciousness appear separately, because of the difference in their states, and because of the difference in their individual functions, they are of a different substantial nature.

original: de ltar na ni 'di yang bde ba la sogs pa dag dang / sems dang ldan pa dag tha dad par khas blangs par 'grub bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na ni 'di yang bde ba la sogs pa dag dang / sems dang ldan pa dag tha dad par khas blangs par 'grub bar 'gyur te /
translated: If that is so, then it is established that you accept that pleasure, etc., and the mind are different.

original: ci ste de ltar tha dad pa yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ste de ltar tha dad pa yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that is so, they are different.

original: gal te bden mod kyang bdag nyid 'ga' zhig rjes su 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir gzhan gcig nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te bden mod kyang bdag nyid 'ga' zhig rjes su 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir gzhan gcig nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that they are one, because they are the same in some way,

original: bde ba la sogs pa dag dang / sems dang ldan pa dag la yang 'dir thal bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa dag dang / sems dang ldan pa dag la yang 'dir thal bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: then the same consequence applies to pleasure, etc., and the mind.

original: bum pa la sogs pa dag kyang thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa dag kyang thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te /
translated: And a pot, etc., is not the same in all respects.

original: rang bzhin sna tshogs pa min pa dang lhan cig skye ba la sogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin sna tshogs pa min pa dang lhan cig skye ba la sogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that it would not be of various natures, that it would be produced simultaneously, and so on.

original: bum pa dang 'ji ba'i bdag nyid tha dad pa 'jig rten pas nye bar mtshon pa med de /
analyzed: bum pa dang 'ji ba'i bdag nyid tha dad pa 'jig rten pas nye bar mtshon pa med de /
translated: The difference in the nature of the pot and the clay is not perceived in the world,

original: gang gis 'di ltar 'dir 'di rab tu skye bar 'gyur zhes bya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis 'di ltar 'dir 'di rab tu skye bar 'gyur zhes bya bar 'gyur /
translated: so how could it be said that ‚Äúthis is produced from that‚Äù?

original: rten dang rten pa'i tha dad pa mi dmigs pa ni de ltar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rten dang rten pa'i tha dad pa mi dmigs pa ni de ltar mi 'gyur te /
translated: The non-apprehension of the difference between the support and the supported is not like that,

original: nus pa las nus pa'i bdag nyid rab tu skye ba med pa'i phyir de'i rang gi bdag nyid las tha dad pa med par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nus pa las nus pa'i bdag nyid rab tu skye ba med pa'i phyir de'i rang gi bdag nyid las tha dad pa med par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: because the nature of the potential is not produced from the potential, so it is not non-different from its own nature.

original: de dag gis ni yongs su 'gyur ba'i lan bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag gis ni yongs su 'gyur ba'i lan bstan pa yin no //
translated: They have explained the response to the objection.

original: gang yang kun du rtog par 'gyur ba gang gang gi yongs su gyur pa de de las tha dad pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang yang kun du rtog par 'gyur ba gang gang gi yongs su gyur pa de de las tha dad pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that whatever is imagined is not different from that,

original: nus pa'i bdag nyid ni yongs su ma gyur pa ma yin na /
analyzed: nus pa'i bdag nyid ni yongs su ma gyur pa ma yin na /
translated: then the nature of the potential is not transformed.

original: yongs su gyur pa zhes bya ba 'dis ci zhig bstan par 'gyur /
analyzed: yongs su gyur pa zhes bya ba 'dis ci zhig bstan par 'gyur /
translated: What does the expression ‚Äúcomplete transformation‚Äù mean?

original: rdzas kyi gnas skabs kyi chos gzhan ldog pa dang / chos gzhan rab tu 'jug pa yongs su gyur pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rdzas kyi gnas skabs kyi chos gzhan ldog pa dang / chos gzhan rab tu 'jug pa yongs su gyur pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The SautrƒÅntikas say: The cessation of the prior mode of being of a substance and the arising of another mode of being is complete transformation.

original: chos gzhan gang yin pa de ldog @333a * //üîΩpa dang rab tu skye bar 'gyur ba de rdzas de nyid kyi gnas skabs yin nam /
analyzed: chos gzhan gang yin pa de ldog @333a * // pa dang rab tu skye bar 'gyur ba de rdzas de nyid kyi gnas skabs yin nam /
translated: What is this other mode of being?üîΩIs it the same as the substance or is it different from it?

original: de las don gzhan yin /
analyzed: de las don gzhan yin /
translated: If it is the same, then it is not correct to say that the prior mode of being ceases and the other mode of being arises.üîΩIf it is different, then you must explain what this other mode of being is.

original: rnam par brtag pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgal te de de nyid yin na de gnas pas ldog pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par brtag pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro // gal te de de nyid yin na de gnas pas ldog pa'am /
translated: Since there is no other mode of being,üîΩif it is the same, then it is not correct to say that the prior mode of being ceases and the other mode of being arises.

original: rab tu 'byung ba med pa de ni de dag yin pa brjod par bya ste /üîΩgnas skabs can gyi chos gzhan zhes bya ba yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab tu 'byung ba med pa de ni de dag yin pa brjod par bya ste / gnas skabs can gyi chos gzhan zhes bya ba yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is different, then it is not correct to say that the prior mode of being ceases and the other mode of being arises.üîΩIf it is the same, then it is not correct to say that the prior mode of being ceases and the other mode of being arises.

original: de nyid ltos pa med pa de ni de'i ltos pa tha dad pa'i chos gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid ltos pa med pa de ni de'i ltos pa tha dad pa'i chos gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is different, then it is not correct to say that the prior mode of being ceases and the other mode of being arises.

original: yang na rdzas las chos don gzhan yin na chos de'i ldog pa dang rab tu skye ba dag rdzas kyi yongs su 'gyur pa ma yin na /üîΩdon gzhan du gyur pa ldog pa dang rab tu skye ba dag ni /
analyzed: yang na rdzas las chos don gzhan yin na chos de'i ldog pa dang rab tu skye ba dag rdzas kyi yongs su 'gyur pa ma yin na / don gzhan du gyur pa ldog pa dang rab tu skye ba dag ni /
translated: Again, if the phenomenon is different from the substance, then the phenomenon‚Äôs cessation and arising would not be transformations of the substance.üîΩBut if cessation and arising are different from the substance,

original: don gzhan gyi yongs su gyur pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan gyi yongs su gyur pa ma yin te /
translated: then cessation and arising would not be transformations of something that is different from the substance.

original: sems dang ldan pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //üîΩrdzas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa'i sgra'i tha snyad mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: sems dang ldan pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // rdzas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa'i sgra'i tha snyad mi 'grub ste /
translated: This is because it would follow that they would also be related to the mind.

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa las dngos po'i 'brel pa gzhan yod pa ni ma yin te 'di la yang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid med pa yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro // rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa las dngos po'i 'brel pa gzhan yod pa ni ma yin te 'di la yang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid med pa yin te /
translated: The term ‚Äúsubstance phenomenon‚Äù would not be established as a compound word because they would not be related.üîΩThere is no other relation of thing and relation apart from the relation of cause and effect.

original: rang nyid de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa de'i rgyu nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir dang / rdzas las chos kyang don gzhan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa de'i rgyu nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir dang / rdzas las chos kyang don gzhan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In this case, there would be no cause and effect because if something is not itself, it is not the cause of that, and because the phenomenon is not different from the substance.

original: don gzhan nyid yin du zin kyang chos kyi rgyu nyid yin na /
analyzed: don gzhan nyid yin du zin kyang chos kyi rgyu nyid yin na /
translated: Even if it were something else, if it were the cause of a phenomenon,

original: chos gzhan 'bras bu skye bas rdzas yongs su gyur pa zhes bya ba de yang 'dod par 'gyur na /
analyzed: chos gzhan 'bras bu skye bas rdzas yongs su gyur pa zhes bya ba de yang 'dod par 'gyur na /
translated: then you would have to accept that the substance of the effect is transformed into something else, the cause.

original: gzhan la yang de 'gal ba med de /
analyzed: gzhan la yang de 'gal ba med de /
translated: But there is no contradiction in this.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rgyun ni /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rgyun ni /
translated: The continuum of cause and effect

original: rgyu 'ji ba'i gong bu'i rdzas snga ma las 'bras bu bum pa'i rdzas phyi ma skye ba na 'ji ba'i rdzas yongs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i tha snyad khas len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu 'ji ba'i gong bu'i rdzas snga ma las 'bras bu bum pa'i rdzas phyi ma skye ba na 'ji ba'i rdzas yongs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i tha snyad khas len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is like the case where the later substance of the effect, the pot, arises from the earlier substance of the cause, the lump of clay, and the convention ‚Äúthe substance of the clay is transformed‚Äù is accepted.

original: chos la rdzas de nyid dang gzhan dag las gzhan rnam par brtag par yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos la rdzas de nyid dang gzhan dag las gzhan rnam par brtag par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But in the case of a phenomenon, it is not tenable to conceive of it as something else that is the same or different in substance.

original: 'on kyang rdzas kyi bkod pa ni gnas skabs gzhan yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang rdzas kyi bkod pa ni gnas skabs gzhan yin te /
translated: However, the arrangement of the substance is a different state.

original: tha dad pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: It is not perceived to be different.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so,

original: khu tshur ni sor mo dag gi khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khu tshur ni sor mo dag gi khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the fist is distinguished from the fingers.

original: sor mo kho na 'ga' zhig khu tshur yin gyi /
analyzed: sor mo kho na 'ga' zhig khu tshur yin gyi /
translated: Some fingers are the fist.

original: thams cad ni ma yin zhing //
analyzed: thams cad ni ma yin zhing //
translated: But not all of them.

original: bu tshur ni sor mo brkyang pa las khyad par med pa'i rang bzhin ma yin te /üîΩkhu tshur dang sor mo'i gnas skabs gnyig la yang /
analyzed: bu tshur ni sor mo brkyang pa las khyad par med pa'i rang bzhin ma yin te / khu tshur dang sor mo'i gnas skabs gnyig la yang /
translated: The nature of a fist is not the same as the nature of the extended fingers.

original: gnyi gar gtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi gar gtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because in both cases, both the fist and the fingers would be present.

original: tha dad pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa de nyid dngos po'i tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa de nyid dngos po'i tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: That which is different has a different nature. That is the characteristic of the difference of entities,

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal @333b lta bu'o //
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal @333b lta bu'o //
translated: like pleasure and pain.

original: gzhan du gyur pa'i khyad par skyen yang brkyang pa'i sor mo nyid dmigs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan du gyur pa'i khyad par skyen yang brkyang pa'i sor mo nyid dmigs par 'gyur te /
translated: Even if the difference of state were generated, the extended fingers would be perceived.

original: rang bzhin 'pho ba med pa'i don gzhan bskyed na ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin 'pho ba med pa'i don gzhan bskyed na ni /
translated: If the generation of another object were the transformation of the nature,

original: rnam pa gzhan dmigs pa med par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan dmigs pa med par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then the perception of another form would not occur.

original: rdzas kho na tha dad pa med pa'i gnas skabs ma yin zhing rdzas las don gzhan yang ma yin na zhes smras pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rdzas kho na tha dad pa med pa'i gnas skabs ma yin zhing rdzas las don gzhan yang ma yin na zhes smras pa ma yin nam /
translated: But didn‚Äôt you say that a substance is not a different state that is not different from a substance, and that it is not a different object from a substance?

original: smras su zin kyang 'di rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: smras su zin kyang 'di rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Even if you say this, it is not logical.

original: yod pa nyid kyi dngos po de nyid gzhan nyid dang bral pa'i rnam pa gzhan yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa nyid kyi dngos po de nyid gzhan nyid dang bral pa'i rnam pa gzhan yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: That very existent thing does not have another aspect that is different from that.

original: de dag ni dngos po phan tshun spangs pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag ni dngos po phan tshun spangs pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because those are characteristics that exist by mutually excluding each other.

original: gcig spangs pa gzhan med na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig spangs pa gzhan med na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When one is excluded, the other cannot exist.

original: skad cig ma re rer 'jig pa'i sor mo dag gi brkyang pa nyid kyang gzhan yin la /
analyzed: skad cig ma re rer 'jig pa'i sor mo dag gi brkyang pa nyid kyang gzhan yin la /
translated: The very extension of the fingers that disintegrate every moment is different from the fist.

original: khu tshur yang gzhan yin no //
analyzed: khu tshur yang gzhan yin no //
translated: The fist is also different.

original: de la khu tshur la sogs pa'i sgra ni khyad par gyi yul can yin la /
analyzed: de la khu tshur la sogs pa'i sgra ni khyad par gyi yul can yin la /
translated: In that case, the word ‚Äúfist‚Äù is a word that has a specific object.

original: sor mo'i sgra ni spyi'i yul can yin zhing /
analyzed: sor mo'i sgra ni spyi'i yul can yin zhing /
translated: The word ‚Äúfinger‚Äù is a word that has a general object.

original: sa bon dang myu gu la sogs pa'i sgra dang / 'bru la sogs pa'i sgra lta bu yang ngo //
analyzed: sa bon dang myu gu la sogs pa'i sgra dang / 'bru la sogs pa'i sgra lta bu yang ngo //
translated: It is also like the words ‚Äúseed‚Äù and ‚Äúsprout,‚Äù and the words ‚Äúgrain‚Äù and so on.

original: de'i phyir sor mo brkyang pa nyid ni khu tshur ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sor mo brkyang pa nyid ni khu tshur ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the very extension of the fingers is not the fist.

original: de la gal te snga ma med pa nyid rgyu las 'bras bur 'gyur na /
analyzed: de la gal te snga ma med pa nyid rgyu las 'bras bur 'gyur na /
translated: In that case, if that which did not exist previously were to become the effect of a cause,

original: ci'i phyir thams cad las thams cad ma yin /
analyzed: ci'i phyir thams cad las thams cad ma yin /
translated: Why is it not the case that everything is produced from everything?

original: 'ga' zhig tu med pa nyid du bye brag med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu med pa nyid du bye brag med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not the case that something does not exist in some place,

original: thams cad la thams cad yod pa nyid yin na yang skyon 'di mtshungs pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: thams cad la thams cad yod pa nyid yin na yang skyon 'di mtshungs pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: then why is it not the case that the same error applies to the position that everything exists in everything?

original: 'ga' zhig yod pa nyid du bye brag med pa yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig yod pa nyid du bye brag med pa yin no //
translated: If you say that it is not the case that something exists in some place,

original: bye brag yod na yang khyad par de yon tan gsum las cha tha dad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bye brag yod na yang khyad par de yon tan gsum las cha tha dad par 'gyur te /
translated: then even if there is a distinction, that distinction would be a part of the three qualities,

original: de yod du zin kyang khyad par rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod du zin kyang khyad par rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but even if it exists, it would not be a distinction because it would not be a universal.

original: yod pa nyid kyis yin na yang bdag nyid thams cad grub pa'i gnas skabs bzhin du ci zhig skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yod pa nyid kyis yin na yang bdag nyid thams cad grub pa'i gnas skabs bzhin du ci zhig skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is because of existence, then just like the state in which everything is established, what is it that arises?

original: sgrub par byed pa 'bras bu med pa yin te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa 'bras bu med pa yin te /
translated: The proof is pointless,

original: bsgrub par bya ba 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is nothing to be proven.

original: khyad par 'ga' zhig gi der ci zhig ltar med pa skye ba yin na 'dir med pa'i khyad par de ci ltar skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: khyad par 'ga' zhig gi der ci zhig ltar med pa skye ba yin na 'dir med pa'i khyad par de ci ltar skye bar 'gyur /
translated: If it is the case that something that does not exist in some place arises as a distinction, then how could that nonexistence arise as a distinction here?

original: skye na yang thams cad las thams cad skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: skye na yang thams cad las thams cad skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: If it did arise, then everything would arise from everything, and the objection and analysis would be the same.

original: gal te khyad par de la rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te khyad par de la rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin pa ma yin te /
translated: If you say that the difference is that the effect is not completely nonexistent in the cause,

original: rnam pa 'ga' zhig yod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa 'ga' zhig yod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: but rather that it exists in some way,

original: 'di ltar med pa'i rnam pa de de la med pa'i phyir rnam pa ci ltar skyed par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ltar med pa'i rnam pa de de la med pa'i phyir rnam pa ci ltar skyed par 'gyur /
translated: then how could it be produced, since that nonexistent aspect does not exist in it?

original: @334a * // rnam pa thams cad du yod pa nyid yin na ni skye ba don med pa nyid yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: @334a * // rnam pa thams cad du yod pa nyid yin na ni skye ba don med pa nyid yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: If it existed in every way, its production would be pointless.

original: rgyu las 'bras bu med pa skye ba yang gang yang gang gi skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin na /
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu med pa skye ba yang gang yang gang gi skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin na /
translated: It is also certain that an effect that does not exist in the cause arises from the cause, since the cause has the nature of producing that which does not exist in it.

original: de nyid las de skye ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de nyid las de skye ba yin gyi /
translated: That effect arises from that cause,

original: gzhan las ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan las ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: but not from another.

original: de yang rang bzhin med pa der rang gi rgyu yin no zhes bya ba ni thog ma med pa nas dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin med pa der rang gi rgyu yin no zhes bya ba ni thog ma med pa nas dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis nges pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, that which is essenceless is its cause, and this is ascertained by the nature of things from beginningless time.

original: gzhan yang ji ltar 'ji ba'i gong bu la bung pa yod pa yin na /
analyzed: gzhan yang ji ltar 'ji ba'i gong bu la bung pa yod pa yin na /
translated: Moreover, if a pot exists in a lump of clay,

original: ji ltar de'i gnas skabs na phyis bzhin du dmigs pa'am don byed pa med /
analyzed: ji ltar de'i gnas skabs na phyis bzhin du dmigs pa'am don byed pa med /
translated: why is it not perceived or functional at that time, as it is later?

original: gal te gsal bar rab tu skye ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gsal bar rab tu skye ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is because it does not arise clearly,

original: de nyid kyi bya ba byed pa'i bum pa yod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de'i gzugs sngar med pa nyid kyi phyir ji ltar bum pa yod pa yin /
analyzed: de nyid kyi bya ba byed pa'i bum pa yod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de'i gzugs sngar med pa nyid kyi phyir ji ltar bum pa yod pa yin /
translated: then why is it a pot, since the pot that performs the function of a pot exists and its form is not previously nonexistent?

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin gzhan gzhan la yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin gzhan gzhan la yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The nature of a thing does not exist in another thing,

original: rang bzhin gyi snang ba tha dad pa yod na /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi snang ba tha dad pa yod na /
translated: because if the appearance of its nature were different,

original: dngos po'i tha dad pa med pa rigs pa ma yin no zhes thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i tha dad pa med pa rigs pa ma yin no zhes thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: it would follow that the thing would not be different, and that is not logical.

original: de'i phyir gang gang du dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni /üîΩyod pa nyid ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gang du dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni / yod pa nyid ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, the non-observation of the nature of that which is the observed object of this or that is not existent.

original: de de'i rang bzhin du gnas pa dag la mi dmigs pa med la mi gnas pa de nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de de'i rang bzhin du gnas pa dag la mi dmigs pa med la mi gnas pa de nyid ma yin te /
translated: But the non-observation of that which is its nature and abides in it is not non-existent.

original: rang bzhin phan tshun du gnas pa dag ma yin pa ni bde ba dang / sdug bsngal lta bu'o zhes bya ba mi dmigs pa'i khyad par med pa'i tha snyad nges pas khyab pa yin no //üîΩde'i phyir mi dmigs pa 'ga' zhig rnam par gcod pa sgrub par byed pas ji skad bshad pa'i dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa nye bar bstan par bya ba bstan nas /
analyzed: rang bzhin phan tshun du gnas pa dag ma yin pa ni bde ba dang / sdug bsngal lta bu'o zhes bya ba mi dmigs pa'i khyad par med pa'i tha snyad nges pas khyab pa yin no // de'i phyir mi dmigs pa 'ga' zhig rnam par gcod pa sgrub par byed pas ji skad bshad pa'i dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa nye bar bstan par bya ba bstan nas /
translated: For example, pleasure and pain do not mutually abide in each other‚Äôs nature. Thus, the non-observation of the nature of that which is the observed object of this or that is not existent.

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa bstan par bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa bstan par bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, having taught the observed object of this or that, which is the observed object of the non-observation of the nature of that which is the observed object of this or that, by way of the exclusion of some non-observation, the proof of the non-observation of the nature of that which is the observed object of this or that is established.

original: khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yang khyab par bya ba dang / khyab par byed pa nyid du chos dag rab tu bsgrubs nas khyad par byed pa ldog pa sgrub par yin no //üîΩrgyu mi dmigs pa yang /
analyzed: khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yang khyab par bya ba dang / khyab par byed pa nyid du chos dag rab tu bsgrubs nas khyad par byed pa ldog pa sgrub par yin no // rgyu mi dmigs pa yang /
translated: Non-apprehension of the pervader is also established by establishing the pervaded and the pervader, and then establishing the reversal of the distinction.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du rab tu bsgrubs na /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du rab tu bsgrubs na /
translated: Non-apprehension of the cause is also established by establishing cause and effect,

original: rgyu ldog pa sgrub par bsgrubs pa yin no //üîΩde dang 'gal ba mi dmigs pa dag kyang /
analyzed: rgyu ldog pa sgrub par bsgrubs pa yin no // de dang 'gal ba mi dmigs pa dag kyang /
translated: and then establishing the reversal of the cause.üîΩNon-apprehension of the contradictory is also established by establishing the two contradictions,

original: 'gal ba gnyis po dag las 'gal ba gcig nye bar bstan pas bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba gnyis po dag las 'gal ba gcig nye bar bstan pas bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: and then establishing one of the two contradictions.

original: de ltar na mi dmigs pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag ma bsgrubs pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar na mi dmigs pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag ma bsgrubs pa ni /
translated: Thus, the non-establishment of the parts of the proof by non-apprehension

original: sgrub pa'i yan lag mi brjod pa'i rgol pa de dag tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin te /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i yan lag mi brjod pa'i rgol pa de dag tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin te /
translated: is the basis for refuting the proponent who does not state the parts of the proof.

original: de ltar ma bsgrubs na /
analyzed: de ltar ma bsgrubs na /
translated: If it is not established in that way,

original: bsgrub par bya ba mi @334b 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba mi @334b 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then the probandum is not established.

original: yang na 'dis sgrub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: yang na 'dis sgrub par byed pa ste /
translated: Or, this establishes the proof.

original: rang gis rtogs pa'i don gzhan dag la zhes bya ba tshul gsum pa'i tshig gi tshogs ni sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rang gis rtogs pa'i don gzhan dag la zhes bya ba tshul gsum pa'i tshig gi tshogs ni sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: The collection of words of the three modes that is understood by oneself is the proof.

original: de'i yan lag phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa'i tshig las de gcig ma brjod na yang sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i yan lag phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa'i tshig las de gcig ma brjod na yang sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma brjod pa yin la /
translated: If any one of the words of the component parts of that proof, such as the property of the subject, is not stated, then a component of the proof is not stated.

original: de yang rgol ba tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin te /
analyzed: de yang rgol ba tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin te /
translated: And that is a case of defeating the opponent.

original: ma brjod pa ni gtan tshigs kyi rang bzhin ma brjod pa yin pas sgrub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma brjod pa ni gtan tshigs kyi rang bzhin ma brjod pa yin pas sgrub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the unstated is a non-statement of the nature of the reason, there is no proof.

original: yang na sgrub par byed pa de nyid kyi yan lag ma yin pa dam bca' ba dang / nye bar sbyar ba dang / mjug bsdu ba la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: yang na sgrub par byed pa de nyid kyi yan lag ma yin pa dam bca' ba dang / nye bar sbyar ba dang / mjug bsdu ba la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa ste /
translated: Or, the proof itself is not a component, such as the thesis, application, and conclusion, etc., which are not components of the proof.

original: sgrub pa'i ngag tu nye bar sbyor ba'i rgol ba dag tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin te /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i ngag tu nye bar sbyor ba'i rgol ba dag tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin te /
translated: The application of those in a statement of proof is a case of defeating the opponent.

original: don med brjod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don med brjod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is a statement of something meaningless.

original: rjes su 'gro ba'am /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'am /
translated: The pervasion

original: ldog pa dag gi chos mthun pa nyid can sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba la re re brjod na grub pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: ldog pa dag gi chos mthun pa nyid can sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba la re re brjod na grub pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: If one states each of the two members of a proof that has the same predicate, then the proof is established.

original: gnyis pa yang don med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gnyis pa yang don med pa'i phyir /
translated: The second member is also meaningless.

original: de yang sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa brjod pa'i rgol ba tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin te /
analyzed: de yang sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa brjod pa'i rgol ba tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is a case of defeating the opponent who states a nonestablished proof,

original: don med pa nyid rjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don med pa nyid rjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it expresses something meaningless.

original: yul bstan pa'i phyir dam bca' ba'i tshig sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma zin tu zin kyang blang bar bya ba kho na ma yin na ma zhe na /
analyzed: yul bstan pa'i phyir dam bca' ba'i tshig sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma zin tu zin kyang blang bar bya ba kho na ma yin na ma zhe na /
translated: If the statement of the thesis is not a part of the proof, then it is not to be stated, because it is meaningless.

original: ma yin te don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not so, because it is meaningless.

original: dam bca' ba'i tshig med du zin kyang ji skad du bshad pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i las 'dod pa'i don nyid 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i tshig med du zin kyang ji skad du bshad pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i las 'dod pa'i don nyid 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: Even if the statement of the thesis is not stated, the desired meaning is established by the proof that has been explained.

original: de 'god pa don med do //
analyzed: de 'god pa don med do //
translated: Therefore, stating it is meaningless.

original: gal te 'di ltar yul nye bar bstan pa med pas rtogs pa mi skye ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar yul nye bar bstan pa med pas rtogs pa mi skye ba yin na /
translated: If one does not understand the desired meaning because the object is not stated,üîΩthen the statement of the thesis is not a part of the proof.

original: ci ltar dam bca' ba sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin /
analyzed: ci ltar dam bca' ba sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin /
translated: Why is the thesis not a part of the proof?

original: phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa'i tshig la yang rtog pa'i rgyu nyid las yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i don gzhan ni ma yin na /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa'i tshig la yang rtog pa'i rgyu nyid las yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i don gzhan ni ma yin na /
translated: The words ‚Äúproperty of the subject‚Äù and so on are not other objects of proof, because they are the cause of the conception of the proof.

original: dam bca' ba'i tshig de yang mtshungs pa ci ltar na sgrub par byed pa ma yin /üîΩyan gar ba la nus pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i tshig de yang mtshungs pa ci ltar na sgrub par byed pa ma yin / yan gar ba la nus pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: If the words of the thesis are similar to those, why are they not a part of the proof?

original: sgrub par byed ba'i yan lag nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed ba'i yan lag nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: They are not a part of the proof because they are not individually capable of proving.

original: phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa la yang de mtshungs pa'i phyir de yang sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa la yang de mtshungs pa'i phyir de yang sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu mi 'gyur te /
translated: The words ‚Äúproperty of the subject‚Äù and so on are also not parts of the proof, because they are similar to that.

original: phyogs kyi chos brjod pa 'ba' zhig gis rtogs pa mi bskyed de /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos brjod pa 'ba' zhig gis rtogs pa mi bskyed de /
translated: The mere statement of the property of the subject does not generate understanding.

original: de dag gis ni the tshom bskyed pa'i lan yang bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag gis ni the tshom bskyed pa'i lan yang bstan pa yin te /
translated: This also shows the response to the doubt that is generated.

original: @335a * // 'brel ba ma bstan par phyogs kyi chos 'ba' zhig brjod pas kyang the tshom skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @335a * // 'brel ba ma bstan par phyogs kyi chos 'ba' zhig brjod pas kyang the tshom skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Even the mere statement of the property of the subject generates doubt because the relation is not stated.

original: de'i phyir dam bca' ba'i tshig la yang rtogs pa'i rgyu nyid las yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir dam bca' ba'i tshig la yang rtogs pa'i rgyu nyid las yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, the words of the thesis are also the cause of understanding.üîΩ

original: sgrub par byed pa'i don gzhan ni ma yin /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i don gzhan ni ma yin /
translated: Therefore, the words of a thesis are not a different object of affirmation than the reason itself, because they are the cause of understanding.

original: dam bca' ba'i tshig de yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ci ltar na sgrub par byed pa ma yin /üîΩyan gar ba la nus pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i tshig de yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ci ltar na sgrub par byed pa ma yin / yan gar ba la nus pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: And since the words of a thesis are similar to the words of a reason, how could they not be a proof?

original: sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: They are not a part of the proof because they are not individually capable of generating understanding.

original: phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa la yang de mtshungs pa'i phyir de yang sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa la yang de mtshungs pa'i phyir de yang sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu mi 'gyur te /
translated: But since the words of a reason are also similar to that, they also would not be a part of the proof.

original: phyogs kyi chos brjod pa 'ba' zhig gis rtogs pa mi bskyed de /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos brjod pa 'ba' zhig gis rtogs pa mi bskyed de /
translated: The mere statement of the property of the subject does not generate understanding.

original: de dag gis ni the tshom bskyed pa'i lan yang bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag gis ni the tshom bskyed pa'i lan yang bstan pa yin te /
translated: This also explains the response to the doubt that arises.

original: 'brel pa ma bstan par phyogs kyi chos 'ba' zhig brjod pas kyang the tshom skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa ma bstan par phyogs kyi chos 'ba' zhig brjod pas kyang the tshom skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because doubt arises when the property of the subject is stated alone without teaching its relation to the thesis.

original: de'i phyir dam bca' ba'i tshig nye bar 'god bsgrub par byed pa'i ngag la ni don med pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dam bca' ba'i tshig nye bar 'god bsgrub par byed pa'i ngag la ni don med pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the statement of a proposition is pointless in a proof statement.

original: de nye bar 'god pa'i rgol ba yang tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: de nye bar 'god pa'i rgol ba yang tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no //
translated: And the challenger who states it is also open to defeat.

original: yang na sgrub par byed pa grub pa'i yan lag ma yin pa ni /üîΩma grub pa'am /
analyzed: yang na sgrub par byed pa grub pa'i yan lag ma yin pa ni / ma grub pa'am /
translated: Or, a proof statement that does not have a complete proofüîΩis one that has a sign that is not established,

original: 'gal ba'am / ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba'am / ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'o //
translated: is contradictory, or is uncertain.

original: de brjod pa'i rgol ba yang tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin te /
analyzed: de brjod pa'i rgol ba yang tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin te /
translated: The challenger who states that is also open to defeat

original: nus pa med pa nye bar 'god pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa med pa nye bar 'god pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he or she is stating something that is not capable of proving the thesis.

original: de bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba la sogs pa med pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba la sogs pa med pa /
translated: Similarly, the challenger who states a proof statement that does not have a complete example is open to defeat.üîΩA complete example is one that has a property that is similar to the subject and the property that is the predicate of the probandum.üîΩA proof statement that does not have a complete example is one that does not have a similar property,

original: rjes su 'gro ba med pa /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med pa /
translated: does not have a similar property that is stated,üîΩor does not have a similar property that is taught.

original: rjes su 'gro ba ma bstan pa la sogs pa yang dpe ltar snang ba sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa brjod pa'i rgol ba tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin te /üîΩnus pa med pa nye bar 'god pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ma bstan pa la sogs pa yang dpe ltar snang ba sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa brjod pa'i rgol ba tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin te /üîΩnus pa med pa nye bar 'god pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The challenger who states that is open to defeat because he or she is stating something that is not capable of proving the thesis.

original: de dag gis gtan tshigs kyi 'grel pa bstan par mi nus te /
analyzed: de dag gis gtan tshigs kyi 'grel pa bstan par mi nus te /
translated: They cannot demonstrate the commentary on the logical reason.üîΩIn order to demonstrate the ability, the branches of the proof areüîΩstated: the subject, the property, the reason, the example, and the application.üîΩThe other is not stated because it is not desired to be known.üîΩThe other is not stated because it is not desired to be known.

analyzed: skabs su bab pa'i don ma yin brjod par byed pa'i phyir dang / de la zhin du don khyad par can dang bcas pa'i phyir rgol bas shes par 'dod pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro // shes par 'dod pa skyon med la //
translated: because it expresses what is irrelevant to the matter at hand, and because it is not what the disputant wishes to establish, since it is accompanied by a special purpose.üîΩThe disputant‚Äôs statement of what he wishes to establish is not to be accepted by the disputant‚Äôs opponent or by the judges, because it is not a proper statement of what he wishes to establish.

original: shes par 'dod pa'i don bkod nas zhar la byung ba gzhan dang gzhan brjod pa dag ni phyir rgol ba dang / rigs pa smra ba'i dbang po dag gis gzung bar 'os pa ma yin te /

translated: The other irrelevant matters that are mentioned are not to be accepted by the judges or by the disputant‚Äôs opponent,

original: de dag gis smra ba rnam par gcod par byed pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de dag gis smra ba rnam par gcod par byed pa kho na yin no //
translated: because they are merely distractions from the matter at hand.

original: don 'ga' zhig tu byed pa na zhar la 'ongs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don 'ga' zhig tu byed pa na zhar la 'ongs pa ma yin te /
translated: When one is engaged in some matter, what is irrelevant is not to be accepted,

original: bdag med par smra ba de sgrub par byed pa na de la glu dang gar la sogs pa dag kyang der zhar la 'ongs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag med par smra ba de sgrub par byed pa na de la glu dang gar la sogs pa dag kyang der zhar la 'ongs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because when one is engaged in establishing that there is no self, singing and dancing and so on are irrelevant to that matter.

analyzed: dper na dam bca' ba brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba 'ga' zhig smra ba ni /

analyzed: kho bo cag sangs rgyas pa bdag yod pa ma yin no zhes smra bar 'gyur ba la /

original: sangs rgyas pa gang yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa gang yin /

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa khas len pa gang yin pa'o//

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang yin /
translated: Who is the Buddha, the Bhagavat?

original: gang gi bstan pa la btsun pa rta dbyangs rab tu byung ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi bstan pa la btsun pa rta dbyangs rab tu byung ba'o //

original: btsun pa rta dbyangs gang yin /
analyzed: btsun pa rta dbyangs gang yin /

analyzed: gang yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba'i zlos gar mkhan no zhes bya ba'i zhar la 'ongs pa byas nas /
translated: Having made this digression,

original: dga' byed ma'i mthar byas te //
analyzed: dga' byed ma'i mthar byas te //

original: de nas mdo 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'don pa dang / gar byed pa dang / glu len pa la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //

translated: And since the opponent is not able to follow all of this digression, does he lose the debate?

original: yin pa brjod pa 'di rnam pa thams cad kyang blo gros ngan pa g-yo sgyus /
analyzed: yin pa brjod pa 'di rnam pa thams cad kyang blo gros ngan pa g-yo sgyus /
translated: All of these statements of existence are for the sake of refuting theüîΩbad logicians who are deceitful.

original: rigs pas grub pa'i don ston pas mi nus pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: rigs pas grub pa'i don ston pas mi nus pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa yin no //
translated: This statement of the thesis is an introduction to the topic by way of a bad intellect that is deceitful and unable to demonstrate the meaning that is established by reasoning.

original: dper na skyes bu'i khyad par sngon du 'gro ba can rnams kyi lus dang dbang po dang / gnas zhes bya ba dam bcas nas lus dang dbang po dang / gnas dag / zol gyis bye brag pa'i bstan bcos 'ba' zhig smra ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na skyes bu'i khyad par sngon du 'gro ba can rnams kyi lus dang dbang po dang / gnas zhes bya ba dam bcas nas lus dang dbang po dang / gnas dag / zol gyis bye brag pa'i bstan bcos 'ba' zhig smra ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the following case: Having made the thesis that the body, the sense faculties, and the abode are preceded by a special person, one explains only the Vai≈õe·π£ika treatise deceitfully, saying, ‚ÄúThe body, the sense faculties, and the abode are the second body and so on.‚Äù

original: sgra rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa zhes rnam par rtsod pa la mtshan nyid bcu gnyis rgyas par bstan bcos rtsom pa po rgyal dpog pas dam bcas pa'i de kho na nyid rtag pa nyid kyi rten sgra dang bum pa las gang yang rung ba de bum pa gnyis pa dang bcasüîΩpa'o zhes bya ba /

original: dam bca' pa khas blangs nas mtshan nyid bcu gnyis la sogs pa 'chad pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: dam bca' pa khas blangs nas mtshan nyid bcu gnyis la sogs pa 'chad pa lta bu ste /
translated: Having accepted that thesis, he explains the twelve characteristics and so on.

original: 'di thams cad blo gros ngan pa rnams kyi nus pa med pa sgrib pa'i thabs la gzu po btang snyoms su bya ba mi rigs so //
analyzed: 'di thams cad blo gros ngan pa rnams kyi nus pa med pa sgrib pa'i thabs la gzu po btang snyoms su bya ba mi rigs so //
translated: It is not right to be indifferent to the means of concealing the incapacity of the unwise.

original: de kho na nyid brtag pa la ni dor thabs la sogs pa rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / g-yo sgyu dang gzhan la brten pa dang dam pa'i sbyor pa la sogs pa dag ni rigs pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid brtag pa la ni dor thabs la sogs pa rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / g-yo sgyu dang gzhan la brten pa dang dam pa'i sbyor pa la sogs pa dag ni rigs pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: In the investigation of reality, the methods of deception and so on are not to be followed, and deceit, reliance on others, and the application of the holy and so on are not right.

original: gal te zlos gar mkhan la sogs pa brjod pa na /
analyzed: gal te zlos gar mkhan la sogs pa brjod pa na /
translated: If it is said that when the actor and so on are mentioned,

original: don gzhan khong du chud pa'i phyir pham par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: don gzhan khong du chud pa'i phyir pham par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: there is defeat because another meaning is understood,

original: gzhan shes par 'dod pa ma yin pa'i khyad par brjod pa las kyang ci'i phyir mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan shes par 'dod pa ma yin pa'i khyad par brjod pa las kyang ci'i phyir mi 'gyur /
translated: why is it not so when a distinction is stated without the desire to know another?

original: de yang 'ga' zhig brjod par 'dod pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos grub pa la med na /
analyzed: de yang 'ga' zhig brjod par 'dod pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos grub pa la med na /
translated: If that is not established in the probandum that is desired to be stated by someone,

original: med pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: med pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: it is not nonexistence.

original: ji ltar rgyu dang rkyen gyis gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid can gyi 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid du grub pa med par mi rtag pa nyid du grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar rgyu dang rkyen gyis gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid can gyi 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid du grub pa med par mi rtag pa nyid du grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Just as impermanence is not established as the suffering of conditioned being, which is the dependent nature, due to causes and conditions.

original: de ltar na yang dngos po'i chos logs shig tu ma smras su zin kyang /
analyzed: de ltar na yang dngos po'i chos logs shig tu ma smras su zin kyang /
translated: Even though the property of the thing is not stated separately,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir dang / phyogs nyid du byas pa nyid yin pas /üîΩlogs shig tu 'di nye bar 'god pa'am /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir dang / phyogs nyid du byas pa nyid yin pas / logs shig tu 'di nye bar 'god pa'am /
translated: since it is included within the probandum, it is taken as the position.

original: bshad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not separately stated or explained.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa de lta bu yang de'i tshe phyir rgol bas shes par 'dod pa'i don ma yin pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa de lta bu yang de'i tshe phyir rgol bas shes par 'dod pa'i don ma yin pa /
translated: Thus, at that time, the opponent's desire to know the meaning is not fulfilled.

original: dam bcas pa dngos po gzhan nye bar 'god pa dang 'chad pa ni don gzhan go par @336b byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshar bcad pa'i gnas nyid yin pa de bas na shes par 'dod pa'i chos tsam kho na sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu brjod kyi
analyzed: dam bcas pa dngos po gzhan nye bar 'god pa dang 'chad pa ni don gzhan go par @336b byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshar bcad pa'i gnas nyid yin pa de bas na shes par 'dod pa'i chos tsam kho na sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu brjod kyi
translated: Since the statement of another thing and the explanation of another thing are understood as different meanings, it is the basis for refutation. Therefore, only the property of the thing that is desired to be known is stated as a part of the proof.

original: zhar la 'ongs pa khas blang bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: zhar la 'ongs pa khas blang bar mi bya ste /
translated: One should not accept the incidental,

original: de khas len na ni shin tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de khas len na ni shin tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if one does accept it, there would be an absurd consequence.

original: de ltar sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag mi brjod pa'i rgol ba ni tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin na //
analyzed: de ltar sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag mi brjod pa'i rgol ba ni tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin na //
translated: Thus, the disputant who does not state the member that establishes is one who is to be refuted.

original: phyir rgol bas de'i dngos po go bar byas na 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: phyir rgol bas de'i dngos po go bar byas na 'gyur gyi /
translated: If the opponent makes him understand that fact, he is refuted.

original: gzhan du na gnyis po gcig kyang rgyal ba dang pham par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na gnyis po gcig kyang rgyal ba dang pham par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, neither of the two would be a victor or a vanquished.

original: phyir rgol bskyon mi brjod pa ni tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: phyir rgol bskyon mi brjod pa ni tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no //
translated: The opponent who does not state a fault is one who is to be refuted.

original: rgol bas sgrub par byed pa rab tu sbyor ba la /
analyzed: rgol bas sgrub par byed pa rab tu sbyor ba la /
translated: When the disputant applies the proof,

original: phyogs phyi ma khas blangs pa'i yul gang la gang gi tshe phyir rgol ba skyon mi brjod pa de'i tshe pham par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs phyi ma khas blangs pa'i yul gang la gang gi tshe phyir rgol ba skyon mi brjod pa de'i tshe pham par brjod par bya'o //
translated: if the opponent does not state a fault with regard to the subject that is accepted in the latter position, then at that time he is to be declared vanquished.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i skyon yang ma tshang ba nyid dang / ma grub pa dang / ma nges pa nyid dang / rgol ba sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa'i don las bzlog ba'i sgrub par byed pa dang / dpe'i skyon de dag mi brjod pa ste /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i skyon yang ma tshang ba nyid dang / ma grub pa dang / ma nges pa nyid dang / rgol ba sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa'i don las bzlog ba'i sgrub par byed pa dang / dpe'i skyon de dag mi brjod pa ste /
translated: The faults of the proof are: incompleteness, nonestablishment, uncertainty, a proof that contradicts the meaning of what is to be established, and the faults of the example.

original: mi ston cing gzhan rnams la go bar mi byed pa'i phyir rgol ba ni pham pa'i rten yin no //üîΩde yang sgrub par byed pa la skyon med pa nyid kyi phyir dang / skyon dang bcas pa nyid yin na yang /
analyzed: mi ston cing gzhan rnams la go bar mi byed pa'i phyir rgol ba ni pham pa'i rten yin no // de yang sgrub par byed pa la skyon med pa nyid kyi phyir dang / skyon dang bcas pa nyid yin na yang /
translated: The opponent is the basis of defeat because he does not state, that is, does not teach, and does not make others understand those.üîΩMoreover, it is not correct to posit defeat when the proof is faultless, and even if it has faults,

original: phyir rgol bas skyon ma bstan na pham pa'i rnam par gzhag pa rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phyir rgol bas skyon ma bstan na pham pa'i rnam par gzhag pa rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: if the opponent does not state the faults.

original: de dag nyid phan tshun nus pa nye bar 'joms pa la ltos nas rgyal pa dang pham par rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag nyid phan tshun nus pa nye bar 'joms pa la ltos nas rgyal pa dang pham par rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are posited as the victor and the defeated in dependence on the mutual destruction of their abilities.

original: sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba 'ba' zhig las kyang yod pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir rab tu ston par byed pa ma yin pa'i rgyal ba yang yod pa nyid ma yin zhing /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba 'ba' zhig las kyang yod pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir rab tu ston par byed pa ma yin pa'i rgyal ba yang yod pa nyid ma yin zhing /
translated: Because of the mere appearance of proof, there is no realization of existence. Therefore, the Victorious One, who is not a teacher, does not exist.

original: de kho na nyid dpyod pa la ni tshig gi dor thabs kyi tha snyad cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: de kho na nyid dpyod pa la ni tshig gi dor thabs kyi tha snyad cung zad kyang med do //
translated: In the analysis of reality, there is not even the slightest conventional method of refutation.

original: gang gi tshe de ltar yin ci'i phyir pham pa ma yin /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de ltar yin ci'i phyir pham pa ma yin /
translated: If this is so, why is it not a defeat?

original: de kho na nyid grub pa las nyams pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de kho na nyid grub pa las nyams pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because of the loss of the establishment of reality.

original: ma yin te sun ma phyung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te sun ma phyung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because there is no refutation.

original: sun phyung ba na de bzhin gyis pham pa yin zhing ma grub pa tsam nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: sun phyung ba na de bzhin gyis pham pa yin zhing ma grub pa tsam nyid ma yin te /
translated: When there is a refutation, it is a defeat, and it is not just the mere nonestablishment of the opponent.

original: phyir rgol ba la ltos pa'i phyir ro //üîΩsgrub pa nyid med pa ni /
analyzed: phyir rgol ba la ltos pa'i phyir ro // sgrub pa nyid med pa ni /
translated: This is because it depends on the opponent.üîΩThe absence of proof

original: sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po nyid med pa ste /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po nyid med pa ste /
translated: is the absence of the entity of proof.

original: phyir rgol ba med kyang yod pa'i phyir dang / phyir rgol bas kyang de sun 'byin par nus pa'i phyir dang / pham pa ma byung ba'i phyir @337a * //
analyzed: phyir rgol ba med kyang yod pa'i phyir dang / phyir rgol bas kyang de sun 'byin par nus pa'i phyir dang / pham pa ma byung ba'i phyir @337a * //
translated: because there is no opponent, even though there is; because the opponent is able to refute it; and because there is no defeat.

original: pham pa ma yin no //
analyzed: pham pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not a defeat.

original: de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nus pa med par brjod pa yang gzhan gyis de ltar gyur pa ma bstan pa ni pham pa yin par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nus pa med par brjod pa yang gzhan gyis de ltar gyur pa ma bstan pa ni pham pa yin par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, even if the proof is stated without force, the opponent's failure to show that it is so should not be called a defeat.

original: gal te g-yo sgyu'i tha snyad yin na yang rgyal bar 'dod pa rnams kyi rtsod pa yin no zhe nam yin te /
analyzed: gal te g-yo sgyu'i tha snyad yin na yang rgyal bar 'dod pa rnams kyi rtsod pa yin no zhe nam yin te /
translated: If it is a deceitful convention, then it is a dispute of those who desire victory.

original: skye bo ngan ba'i log par rtogs pa la brten nas dam pa dag gi bstan bcos la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye bo ngan ba'i log par rtogs pa la brten nas dam pa dag gi bstan bcos la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not so, because evil people, on the basis of wrong understanding, do not engage in the treatises of the holy.

original: gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa la 'jug pa brdzun smra ba dang / dam pa dang / bdag bstod cing gzhan la smod pa la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tha snyad ston par mi byed do //
analyzed: gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa la 'jug pa brdzun smra ba dang / dam pa dang / bdag bstod cing gzhan la smod pa la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tha snyad ston par mi byed do //
translated: One who engages in caring for others does not teach false conventions such as I am holy or I praise myself and disparage others.

original: gzhan la smod pa'i sgo nas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / nye bar mtshon pa'i dam pa dag gi spyod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan la smod pa'i sgo nas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / nye bar mtshon pa'i dam pa dag gi spyod pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not the practice of the holy to seek gain, honor, and fame by disparaging others.

original: dam pas bsngags pa rnams kyi bstan bcos byed pa'i tshogs kyi nang na 'dug pa dag la ni /
analyzed: dam pas bsngags pa rnams kyi bstan bcos byed pa'i tshogs kyi nang na 'dug pa dag la ni /
translated: The holy do not compose treatises in an assembly of people who are so engaged.

original: de ltar 'jug pa dag la gnang ba gsol pa'i sgo nas srog chags rnams nye bar gdung bar byed pa /
analyzed: de ltar 'jug pa dag la gnang ba gsol pa'i sgo nas srog chags rnams nye bar gdung bar byed pa /
translated: They do not torment living beings by asking for permission to engage in such activity.

original: dam pas bsngags pa ma yin pa rigs pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: dam pas bsngags pa ma yin pa rigs pa ma yin zhing /
translated: The holy do not engage in such activity, which is not praised by the holy.

original: dam pa rnams ni rnyed pa la sogs pa nye bar bsags pa'i phyir rigs pa'i bstan bcos byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dam pa rnams ni rnyed pa la sogs pa nye bar bsags pa'i phyir rigs pa'i bstan bcos byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The holy do not compose treatises in order to acquire gain and so on.üîΩTherefore, the treatises of the holy are not composed for the sake of gain and so on.

original: de'i phyir rigs pas byed pa ma yin pa 'ba' zhig rgyal bar 'dod ba dag gi rtsod pa yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rigs pas byed pa ma yin pa 'ba' zhig rgyal bar 'dod ba dag gi rtsod pa yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: Those who desire victory in a dispute should not compose treatises for the sake of gain and so on.

original: dam pa gzhan rjes su 'dzin pas 'jug pa dag ni log par rtogs pa dag gis khong du chud par byed pa na /
analyzed: dam pa gzhan rjes su 'dzin pas 'jug pa dag ni log par rtogs pa dag gis khong du chud par byed pa na /
translated: Those who are engaged in the holy life in order to care for others should not compose treatises for the sake of gain and so on.

original: yang dag pa'i sgrub par byed pa brjod pa'am /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i sgrub par byed pa brjod pa'am /
translated: or by stating the correct proof,

original: yang dag pa'i skyon brjod pa'i sgo nas /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i skyon brjod pa'i sgo nas /
translated: or by stating the correct fault,

original: rigs pa'i rjes su 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rigs pa'i rjes su 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: one will follow the reasoning.

original: dbang po'i mngon sum nyid du go la bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po'i mngon sum nyid du go la bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is understood by the direct perception of the sense faculties.

original: de ltar na dam pa rigs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na dam pa rigs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rtsod pa'o //
translated: Thus, this is the argument of the noble ones who follow reasoning.

original: gang gi tshe rigs pas bstan pa na de kho na'i don rtogs par 'dod na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rigs pas bstan pa na de kho na'i don rtogs par 'dod na /
translated: When the meaning of reality is taught through reasoning, if one wishes to understand it,

original: des rtogs te /
analyzed: des rtogs te /
translated: one will understand it.

original: de rtogs pa med pa gzhan gyis kyang mi rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de rtogs pa med pa gzhan gyis kyang mi rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not that one who does not understand it will not understand it.

original: gal te de kho na nyid bsrung ba'i don du dam pa rnams kyang rgyal bar 'dod pa rgyu la sogs pa dag gis tshar gcad par bya ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de kho na nyid bsrung ba'i don du dam pa rnams kyang rgyal bar 'dod pa rgyu la sogs pa dag gis tshar gcad par bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If one says that even the noble ones who wish to protect reality should be defeated by arguments such as causality,

original: ma yin te khu tshur dang / thal lcag dang / mtshon chas bsnun pa dang / me la sogs pa dag gis kyang zhes brjod par bya na /
analyzed: ma yin te khu tshur dang / thal lcag dang / mtshon chas bsnun pa dang / me la sogs pa dag gis kyang zhes brjod par bya na /
translated: no, because one could also say that they should be defeated by fists, slaps, weapons, fire, and so on.

original: 'di de kho na nyid bsrung ba'i thabs dam @337b pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di de kho na nyid bsrung ba'i thabs dam @337b pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not the true method of protecting reality.

original: dam pa rnams kyis sgrub par byed pa rab tu ston par byed pa dang sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba sun 'byin par byed pa ni de kho na nyid bsrung ba'i thabs yin no //
analyzed: dam pa rnams kyis sgrub par byed pa rab tu ston par byed pa dang sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba sun 'byin par byed pa ni de kho na nyid bsrung ba'i thabs yin no //
translated: The true method of protecting reality is to teach the practice of the holy and to refute the practice of the counterfeit.

original: de med par brdzun pa dang / dam pa dang / gzhan gdung bar byed pa brjod du zin kyang /
analyzed: de med par brdzun pa dang / dam pa dang / gzhan gdung bar byed pa brjod du zin kyang /
translated: Even if one were to speak falsely, or speak of the holy, or speak of the suffering of others,

original: de kho na nyid rab tu gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid rab tu gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: there would be no protection of reality, because there would be no teaching of the practice of the holy.

original: rnam pa gzhan du mkhas pa dag la rigs pa ston pa dag ni rab tu gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde'i phyir rgol bas gzhan rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du mkhas pa dag la rigs pa ston pa dag ni rab tu gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro // de'i phyir rgol bas gzhan rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
translated: On the other hand, if one teaches the principles of reasoning to the wise, there is protection of reality, because the wise are established in the practice of the holy.

original: de kho na nyid rab tu ston pa ni rgyal ba yin la /
analyzed: de kho na nyid rab tu ston pa ni rgyal ba yin la /
translated: Therefore, the victor is the one who teaches reality in order to help others.

original: yang dag pa'i skyon brjod pa'i sgo nas log pa'i 'jug pa ldog pa ni phyir rgol ba rgyal ba yin no //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i skyon brjod pa'i sgo nas log pa'i 'jug pa ldog pa ni phyir rgol ba rgyal ba yin no //
translated: The opponent who refutes the false practice by pointing out its errors is the victor.

original: yang na sgrub par byed pa la skyon ma yin pa brjod pa gang yin pa de yang /üîΩrgol bas sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa'i don grub pa la gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na sgrub par byed pa la skyon ma yin pa brjod pa gang yin pa de yang / rgol bas sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa'i don grub pa la gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or else, when one states that the reason is not faulty,

original: de rjod par byed pa'i phyir rgol ba tshar gcad pa'i rten yin te /
analyzed: de rjod par byed pa'i phyir rgol ba tshar gcad pa'i rten yin te /
translated: this is also a basis for the defeat of the disputant, because it does not undermine the establishment of the meaning that the disputant himself accepts as the probandum.

original: log pa'i lan rjod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: log pa'i lan rjod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is a basis for the defeat of the disputant because it causes him to state a reply that is not correct.

original: dper na rgol ba'i chos bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa ma yin pa yang bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba de bzlog pa'i sgo nas 'gal ba brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: dper na rgol ba'i chos bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa ma yin pa yang bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba de bzlog pa'i sgo nas 'gal ba brjod pa yin no //
translated: For example, when one states that the thesis of the disputant is not what he himself accepts as the probandum, but is the probandum because it is accepted in the treatise, this is a statement of contradiction, since it contradicts the thesis.

original: bdag med do zhes bya ba'i dam bca' ba'i tshig 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba dam bca' ba'i skyon brjod pa'o //
analyzed: bdag med do zhes bya ba'i dam bca' ba'i tshig 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba dam bca' ba'i skyon brjod pa'o //
translated: The statement, ‚ÄúThe words of the thesis, ‚ÄòThere is no self,‚Äô are contradictory,‚Äù is a statement of the fault of the thesis.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs chos can gyi bye brag nyid yin pa'i phyir dam bcas pa'i skyon gyi phyogs gcig yin no zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa nyid rjod par byed pa lta bu ste sgrub byed dang chos
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs chos can gyi bye brag nyid yin pa'i phyir dam bcas pa'i skyon gyi phyogs gcig yin no zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa nyid rjod par byed pa lta bu ste sgrub byed dang chos
translated: The reason because it occurs as soon as it is sought is a particular of the subject, and so it is a one-sided fault of the thesis. This is like stating unproven when the reason is unproven.

original: mthun pa la sogs pa thams cad du lan ltar snang ba yin no //
analyzed: mthun pa la sogs pa thams cad du lan ltar snang ba yin no //
translated: In all cases, such as the similar property, the response is similar.

original: de lta bu la sogs pa skyon ltar snang ba brjod pa ni skyon mi brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu la sogs pa skyon ltar snang ba brjod pa ni skyon mi brjod pa'o //
translated: Stating faults that are not faults, such as these, is not stating faults.

original: rgol bas de'i skyon ltar snang ba brjod pa nyid du rab tu ston pa ni /
analyzed: rgol bas de'i skyon ltar snang ba brjod pa nyid du rab tu ston pa ni /
translated: When the respondent clearly shows that the opponent has stated a fault that is not a fault,

original: phyir rgol ba pham par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: phyir rgol ba pham par brjod par bya ste /
translated: the opponent should be declared defeated.

original: phyogs snga ma'i sgrub par byed pa skyon med pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: phyogs snga ma'i sgrub par byed pa skyon med pa nyid la'o //
translated: This is in the case of the opponent's proof being faultless.

original: skyon dang ldan pa yin na yang sgrub par byed pa la gnyi ga las gcig kyang rgyal ba dang pham pa dag ma yin te /
analyzed: skyon dang ldan pa yin na yang sgrub par byed pa la gnyi ga las gcig kyang rgyal ba dang pham pa dag ma yin te /
translated: Even if it has faults, in the proof, neither one is a victor or a loser.

original: de kho na nyid khong du chud par byed pa med ba nyid kyi phyir dang / skyon brjod pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid khong du chud par byed pa med ba nyid kyi phyir dang / skyon brjod pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because there is no penetration of reality, and because there is no expression of faults.

original: gnyen po'i phyogs med cing rang gi phyogs grub par byas pa dag ni rgyal ba yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyen po'i phyogs med cing rang gi phyogs grub par byas pa dag ni rgyal ba yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who have no antidote and who have established their own position are the victors.

original: de'i phyir shes @338a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes @338a * //
translated: Therefore, those who desire knowledge

original: par 'dod pas rang gi phyogs sgrub pa dang / gzhan gyi phyogs sun dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: par 'dod pas rang gi phyogs sgrub pa dang / gzhan gyi phyogs sun dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: should establish their own position and refute the position of others.

original: rgol bas skyon med pa'i sgrub par byed pa brjod pa la /
analyzed: rgol bas skyon med pa'i sgrub par byed pa brjod pa la /
translated: When the disputant states a proof that is free of faults,

original: phyir rgol bas skyon lta bur snang bar brjod na sun 'byin pa ltar snang ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir rgyal ba dang pham pa dag yin gyi rnam pa gzhan du ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyir rgol bas skyon lta bur snang bar brjod na sun 'byin pa ltar snang ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir rgyal ba dang pham pa dag yin gyi rnam pa gzhan du ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: if the opponent states what appears to be a fault, then there is victory and defeat because of the mere expression of what appears to be a refutation.

original: dngos po'i de kho na nyid brjod du zin kyang gnyen po'i phyogs kyis sun dbyung ba'i sgo nas de kho na bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po'i de kho na nyid brjod du zin kyang gnyen po'i phyogs kyis sun dbyung ba'i sgo nas de kho na bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir /
translated: Even if the reality of things is stated, because it is not possible to teach reality by way of refuting it with an antidote,

original: phyir rgol ba yang 'dir rgyal bar 'gyur ba ma yin te dngos po log par ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir rgol ba yang 'dir rgyal bar 'gyur ba ma yin te dngos po log par ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the opponent is not victorious here, because he teaches a thing that is reversed.

original: gzhan ni mi rigs phyir mi 'dod //
analyzed: gzhan ni mi rigs phyir mi 'dod //
translated: The other is not accepted because it is unreasonable.

original: gang du 'dir ji skad bshad pa'i tshar bcad pa'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni tshar bcad pa'i gnas nyid du rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang du 'dir ji skad bshad pa'i tshar bcad pa'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni tshar bcad pa'i gnas nyid du rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Where there is no characteristic of a ground for refutation as explained here, it is not reasonable for that to be a ground for refutation.

original: kho bo cag gis ma bstan to zhes smras pa yin no //
analyzed: kho bo cag gis ma bstan to zhes smras pa yin no //

original: de la mi mthun pa'i dpe'i chos rang gi dpe la khas len na dam bca' ba la gnod pa yin te /
analyzed: de la mi mthun pa'i dpe'i chos rang gi dpe la khas len na dam bca' ba la gnod pa yin te /
translated: If one accepts the property of a dissimilar example in one's own example, it contradicts one's thesis.

analyzed: tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba 'di la 'grel pa byed pa'i bsam pa sun phyung nas /

analyzed: mi mthun pa'i dpe'i chos gang yin pa de gang gi tshe rang gi dpe la khas len par byed pa de'i tshe /

original: tshar gcad par bya ba yin par brjod do //üîΩde la mthong ba yang de yin la //
analyzed: tshar gcad par bya ba yin par brjod do // de la mthong ba yang de yin la //
translated: The ‚Äúpoint of defeat‚Äù is the point at which one is defeated.

original: mthar yang rnam par gnas pa yin pa'i phyir mthong ba'i mtha' ste /
analyzed: mthar yang rnam par gnas pa yin pa'i phyir mthong ba'i mtha' ste /
translated: It is the point at which one is defeated because one‚Äôs view is also that and because one‚Äôs view is also that which is to be refuted.

original: mthong ba'i mtha' ni rang gi phyogs so //
analyzed: mthong ba'i mtha' ni rang gi phyogs so //

original: mi mthun pa'i dpe ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs te /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i dpe ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs te /
translated: The ‚Äúcounter-example‚Äù is the counter-position.

analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos rang gi phyogs la khas len pa pham pa ste /
translated: The defeat is the acceptance of the property of the counter-position in one‚Äôs own position.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag ste /üîΩdbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa la phyir rgol ba spyi'i sgo nas phyir bzlog pa na /
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag ste / dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa la phyir rgol ba spyi'i sgo nas phyir bzlog pa na /
translated: For example, someone says, ‚ÄúSound is impermanent because it is perceptible by the senses.‚ÄùüîΩWhen the opponent refutes it by way of the general,

analyzed: gal te de tshe spyi dbang pos gzung bar bya ba yin pas /
translated: saying, ‚ÄúIf it is perceptible by the senses because of being a generality,

original: dam bca' ba la gnod pa ste /
analyzed: dam bca' ba la gnod pa ste /

analyzed: dam bca' la gnod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i khyad par nges pa 'di sus @338b byas /

original: rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas kyang gtan tshigs kyi skyon brjod pa la stsogs pa dang srid pa nyid de /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas kyang gtan tshigs kyi skyon brjod pa la stsogs pa dang srid pa nyid de /

analyzed: gnyen po'i phyogs sgrub par byed pa brjod pas kyang rang gi phyogs btang ba dang / gzhan gyi phyogs khas blangs par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gnod pa yang pham pa'o //

analyzed: sgra yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'brel pa nyid de rang bzhin du gnas pa /

analyzed: rang nyid dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir /

original: sgra ni mi rtag ste /
analyzed: sgra ni mi rtag ste /

analyzed: bum pa lta bu zhes smra ba /

original: gang gis spyi nye bar bstan pa tsam gyis sgo nas sgra rtag pa khong du chud par byed /üîΩspyi rtag pa nyid kyang dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid de ni /
analyzed: gang gis spyi nye bar bstan pa tsam gyis sgo nas sgra rtag pa khong du chud par byed / spyi rtag pa nyid kyang dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid de ni /

analyzed: bum pa mi rtag pa nyid la yang mthong ba'i phyir the tshom bskyed par 'gyur gyi /

analyzed: 'di ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs khas blangs pa ma yin no //

analyzed: spyi bstan pas ci zhig bya /

analyzed: 'di ltar sgra rtag pa yin par gzung bar bya ste zhes brjod par bya ste / mi shes pa'i rtogs pa dag la ni /
