analyzed: rnam par dpyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: there is no analysis.

original: rtag par spyi nye bar bstan pa'i sgo nas /
analyzed: rtag par spyi nye bar bstan pa'i sgo nas /

analyzed: de'i chos sgra la khong du chud par byed pa ste /

original: gnyen po'i phyogs khas blangs par mi 'gyur ro //

original: sgra mi rtag ces bya ba brjod pa la /

analyzed: spyi rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba ni ma yin no // de'i phyir dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid ni /
translated: but not ‚ÄúThe universal is permanent.‚Äù

analyzed: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i phyogs la 'jug pas 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, because being perceptible by the senses is involved in the positions of permanence and impermanence, it is mistaken.

analyzed: dam bcas pa'i don bkag pa la /

analyzed: chos rnam par brtags nas de'i don ston pa ni /

analyzed: dam bcas pa gzhan no //

analyzed: dam bcas pa nyid kyi don ni sgra mi rtag ste /

analyzed: dbang pos gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan @339a * //

analyzed: spyi dang bum pa dag ni thams cad du 'gro dang thams cad du 'gro ba nyid ma yin pa'i chos rnam par brtags pa'i sgo nas dam bcas pa gzhan byed de /
translated: he makes another thesis by analyzing the properties of universals and pots as being omnipresent and not omnipresent, respectively.

analyzed: dper na bum pa thams cad 'gro ba ma yin pa de bzhin du sgra dang thams cad du 'gro ba ma yin pas mi rtag pa zhes pa'o //

analyzed: de ni dam bcas pa gzhan zhes bya ba tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin te /

analyzed: dbang pos gzung bar bya ba'i gtan tshigs spyi la 'jug pas 'khrul par brjod pa la thams cad du 'gro ba ma yin te /

analyzed: dam bcas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin gyi / 'on kyang gtan tshigs la sogs pa gzhan du bsgrub par bya ba pa'i ched du khas blangs pa'i phyir /

analyzed: sgrub par byed pa bstan par 'gyur gyi /

analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa @339b ni ma yin no //

original: dper brjod pa dang chos mthun pa nyid la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid thams cad du 'gro ba nyid ma yin pa la yod pa'i phyir dang / thams cad du 'gro ba ma yin pa gtan tshigs nyid du rigs kyi /

translated: The reason, example, etc., are not universal characteristics of proof, because they exist in non-universals, and non-universals are suitable to be reasons,

original: dam bca' ba nyid du ma yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' ba nyid du ma yin no //
translated: but not theses.

analyzed: shin du yang dam bcas pa dam bcas pas sgrub pa'i ched du smras pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di 'brel pa med pa nyid do //

original: gang gis sngar dam bcas pa smras nas /
analyzed: gang gis sngar dam bcas pa smras nas /
translated: And what is the connection between the statement Having stated the thesis first,

analyzed: gtan tshigs dang dpe la sogs pa dag brjod ces pa gang yin pa des rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis sgrub par byed pa'i go rims shes pa yin na nang gi dbang po nyams pa med par dam bcas pa kho na /
translated: the reason, example, etc., are stated and the statement If one knows the order of proof in some way, then the thesis alone is stated, without the reason, example, etc.?

analyzed: mkhas pa'i rgol ba dag ni de lta bu'i rnam pa'i tha snyad 'ga' zhig kyang sngar ma mthong ba gang gis de'i don rtsol bas byed /

analyzed: byis pa'i brjod pa la brten nas kyang bstan bcos la 'jug par mi 'gyur la /

analyzed: 'jug na yang mthar thug pa med de /
translated: Even if one does engage, it is not final,

original: de dag la mthar thug pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag la mthar thug pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because they are not final themselves.

original: mkhas pa dag gis kyang shin du rnam par dpyad pa ma byas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mkhas pa dag gis kyang shin du rnam par dpyad pa ma byas pa'i phyir /
translated: The wise do not engage in thorough analysis,

original: ma grub pa la sogs pa rjod par byed pa zhes bya ba mthong zhing tha snyad du byed de tha snyad kyang mthong ba'i phyir de 'dra ba'i pham pa'i rten du rnam par 'jog par byed do //
analyzed: ma grub pa la sogs pa rjod par byed pa zhes bya ba mthong zhing tha snyad du byed de tha snyad kyang mthong ba'i phyir de 'dra ba'i pham pa'i rten du rnam par 'jog par byed do //
translated: and so they see and use expressions such as ‚Äúunproven,‚Äù and because they see conventions, they posit such as the basis for defeat.

original: de'i phyir 'dir rgol ba'i 'dod pa ldog pa gang gi tshe gzhan ma nges pa nyid du brjod par 'gyur ba de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa ma nges pa rjod par byed pa'i phyir rgol ba tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir rgol ba'i 'dod pa ldog pa gang gi tshe gzhan ma nges pa nyid du brjod par 'gyur ba de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa ma nges pa rjod par byed pa'i phyir rgol ba tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no //
translated: Therefore, when the opponent‚Äôs thesis is refuted here, if the other is said to be unestablished, then at that time, because the unestablished is stated as a part of the proof, the opponent is defeated.

original: gal te phyir rgol bas spyi yod pa dang / dbang pos gzung bar bya ba yin pa dang / rtag par tshad mas sgrub par nus na @340a * //
analyzed: gal te phyir rgol bas spyi yod pa dang / dbang pos gzung bar bya ba yin pa dang / rtag par tshad mas sgrub par nus na @340a * //
translated: If the opponent is able to prove by means of a valid cognition that the universal exists, that it is perceptible by the sense faculties, and that it is permanent,

original: 'gyur ro // tshad ma ma yin pa'i bstan bcos la brten nas khas len pa'i don de dag tshad mas ma bstan pa /
analyzed: 'gyur ro // tshad ma ma yin pa'i bstan bcos la brten nas khas len pa'i don de dag tshad mas ma bstan pa /
translated: then the proponent will be defeated. However, if the opponent accepts those points on the basis of an invalid treatise,

original: yang dag pa'i skyon brjod pa med pas 'ga' zhig pham pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i skyon brjod pa med pas 'ga' zhig pham pa ma yin te /
translated: and if the proponent does not point out the faults of the opponent‚Äôs position by means of a valid cognition, then the proponent will not be defeated.

original: khas blangs pa tsam gyis dngos po grub pa yang med pa'i phyir dang / phyir rgol ba'i skyon ma bstan pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
analyzed: khas blangs pa tsam gyis dngos po grub pa yang med pa'i phyir dang / phyir rgol ba'i skyon ma bstan pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
translated: This is because a thing is not established by mere assertion, and because the opponent‚Äôs faults have not been pointed out.

original: tshad mas ma bsgrubs pa'i sgrub par byed pa rjod pa las rgyal bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad mas ma bsgrubs pa'i sgrub par byed pa rjod pa las rgyal bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Nor will the proponent be defeated if he states a proof that is not established by a valid cognition.

original: rgol ba'i 'dod pa'i don ma log na yang skyon 'ga' yang med do /
analyzed: rgol ba'i 'dod pa'i don ma log na yang skyon 'ga' yang med do /
translated: And if the opponent‚Äôs intended meaning is not refuted, then there is no fault at all.

original: khyad par brjod pa'i sgo nas gtan tshigs nus pa nye bar ma bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par brjod pa'i sgo nas gtan tshigs nus pa nye bar ma bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the power of the reason is not established by the expression of a distinction.

original: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba ni /
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba ni /
translated: A contradiction between the thesis and the reason is as follows.

original: dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba ste /
translated: Contradiction with a thesis.

original: dper na yon tan las ma rtogs pa'i rdzas zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'o //
analyzed: dper na yon tan las ma rtogs pa'i rdzas zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'o //
translated: For example, the thesis is: ‚ÄúThe substance that is not known from the qualities.‚Äù

original: gzugs la sogs pa las don mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa las don mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: The reason is: ‚ÄúBecause the object is not perceived from form, etc.‚Äù

original: de ni 'dir dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dag tu 'gal ba'o//
analyzed: de ni 'dir dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dag tu 'gal ba'o//
translated: Here there is a contradiction between the thesis and the reason.

original: de nyid kyis ni dam bcas pa dang 'gal ba yang bstan te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni dam bcas pa dang 'gal ba yang bstan te /
translated: By this, contradiction with a thesis is also shown.

original: gang la dam bca' ba rang gi tshig dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba ni dper na dge sbyong ma sbrum ma'am /
analyzed: gang la dam bca' ba rang gi tshig dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba ni dper na dge sbyong ma sbrum ma'am /
translated: For example, the thesis is: ‚ÄúThe ascetic is not pregnant.‚Äù

original: bdag med do zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: bdag med do zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: Or: ‚ÄúThere is no self.‚Äù

original: gtan tshigs la 'gal ba yang /
analyzed: gtan tshigs la 'gal ba yang /
translated: Contradiction with a reason.

original: gang la dam bcas pa gtan tshigs la gnod pa ni dper na thams cad tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: gang la dam bcas pa gtan tshigs la gnod pa ni dper na thams cad tha dad pa yin te /
translated: For example, the thesis is: ‚ÄúEverything is different.‚Äù

original: tshogs pa la dngos po'i sgra sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa la dngos po'i sgra sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: The reason is: ‚ÄúBecause the word ‚Äòthing‚Äô is applied to an aggregate.‚Äù

original: de dag gis ni dam bca' ba dang dpe'i 'gal ba dang / gtan tshigs dang dpe la sogs pa'i 'gal ba dang / tshad ma'i 'gal ba dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dag la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis ni dam bca' ba dang dpe'i 'gal ba dang / gtan tshigs dang dpe la sogs pa'i 'gal ba dang / tshad ma'i 'gal ba dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dag la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The contradiction of thesis and reason should also be mentioned.

original: gzhan gyi phyogs la ba la lang nyid la stsogs pa rang la grub pa'i sgo nas ma nges par bstan pa'i phyir 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi phyogs la ba la lang nyid la stsogs pa rang la grub pa'i sgo nas ma nges par bstan pa'i phyir 'gal ba ste /
translated: The contradiction of thesis and reason is taught to be uncertain in terms of the opponent's position being established for oneself.üîΩThe contradiction of thesis and reason is known to be the statement of error in terms of the opponent's position being established for oneself.üîΩThe contradiction of thesis and reason is also independent.üîΩThe contradiction of thesis and reason is also independent.üîΩThe contradiction of thesis and reason is also independent.

original: gzhan gyi phyogs la rang la grub pa'i ba lang nyid la sogs pas 'khrul par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni 'gal ba yin par rig par bya'o //üîΩrang gi phyogs la ltos pa med pa yang ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi phyogs la rang la grub pa'i ba lang nyid la sogs pas 'khrul par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni 'gal ba yin par rig par bya'o // rang gi phyogs la ltos pa med pa yang ste /
translated: The contradiction of thesis and reason is also independent.üîΩThe contradiction of thesis and reason is also independent.üîΩThe contradiction of thesis and reason is also original: gang rang gi phyogs la ltos pa med par yang gtan tshigs sbyor ba ste /üîΩsgra mi rtag ste dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gang rang gi phyogs la ltos pa med par yang gtan tshigs sbyor ba ste /üîΩsgra mi rtag ste dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
translated: The contradiction of thesis and reason is also independent.üîΩThe contradiction of thesis and reason

original: de'i rang la grub pa ba lang nyid la sogs pa mi rtag pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir 'gal ba yin @340b zhing gnyi ga'i phyogs kyis khas blangs pa yin na ni ma nges pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i rang la grub pa ba lang nyid la sogs pa mi rtag pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir 'gal ba yin @340b zhing gnyi ga'i phyogs kyis khas blangs pa yin na ni ma nges pa yin te /
translated: If both parties accept it, then it is indeterminate.

original: gang gnyi ga'i phyogs kyis khas blangs pa'i dngos po yin pa de'i phyir ma nges par brjod do //
analyzed: gang gnyi ga'i phyogs kyis khas blangs pa'i dngos po yin pa de'i phyir ma nges par brjod do //
translated: Because it is a thing that both parties accept, it is called indeterminate.

original: 'dir yang dam bcas pa la sgrub par byed pa'i tshig sbyor ba bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang dam bcas pa la sgrub par byed pa'i tshig sbyor ba bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the statement of proof is also refuted in relation to the thesis.

original: de rten nam des byas pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag la 'gal ba med pas dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dag 'gal ba zhes bya ba'i tshar bcad pa'i gnas cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de rten nam des byas pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag la 'gal ba med pas dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dag 'gal ba zhes bya ba'i tshar bcad pa'i gnas cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Since there is no contradiction in the reason and example that are based on that or produced by that, there is not even the slightest basis for refutation called ‚Äúthe thesis and reason are contradictory.‚Äù

original: gal te de ltar ni 'gyur ba sbyor ba med du zin kyang go bar bya ba yin na dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs dang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te de ltar ni 'gyur ba sbyor ba med du zin kyang go bar bya ba yin na dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs dang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If that were so, then even without the application of a proof statement, if it is understood, there would be a contradiction between the thesis and the reason.

original: dper na gzugs la sogs pa dag las don gzhan rdzas ma dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dper na gzugs la sogs pa dag las don gzhan rdzas ma dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: For example, it is like the following: the non-observation of a substance that is a different object from form and so on is taught to be the non-observation of a substance that is different from form and so on and is different from the qualities.

original: yon tan las tha dad pa gzugs la sogs pa dag las don gzhan rdzas ma dmigs so zhes bstan zin kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag 'gal ba nyid du khong du chud par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yon tan las tha dad pa gzugs la sogs pa dag las don gzhan rdzas ma dmigs so zhes bstan zin kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag 'gal ba nyid du khong du chud par 'gyur te /
translated: Even though this has already been taught, one should understand that the probandum and the proof are contradictory.

original: de las don gzhan mi dmigs pa dang / de tha dad pa yin no zhes bya bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de las don gzhan mi dmigs pa dang / de tha dad pa yin no zhes bya bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How could it be that the non-observation of a different object from that and the difference from that are established?

original: bden mod kyi gal te gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub par bya ba'i chos las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa na 'gal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bden mod kyi gal te gtan tshigs kyi bsgrub par bya ba'i chos las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa na 'gal bar 'gyur te /
translated: It is true that if the proof establishes the opposite of the property of the probandum, then it is contradictory.

original: 'di ltar dmigs pa'i rigs byar gyur pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: 'di ltar dmigs pa'i rigs byar gyur pa nyid kyis /
translated: In this way, the very fact that it is a type of observation

original: rdzas yod pa nyid khas blangs pa gzugs la sogs pa'i snang ba las tha dad pa rang gi snang ba mi dmigs pa de ni /
analyzed: rdzas yod pa nyid khas blangs pa gzugs la sogs pa'i snang ba las tha dad pa rang gi snang ba mi dmigs pa de ni /
translated: is the non-observation of a different appearance from the appearance of form and so on, which is the assertion of substantial existence.

original: de las tha dad pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de las tha dad pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not different from that.

original: tha dad pa 'dod pa las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir dang / 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs su kho bo cag gis smras pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: tha dad pa 'dod pa las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir dang / 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs su kho bo cag gis smras pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because it proves the opposite of the assertion of difference, and because we have stated the reason for the contradiction.

original: 'di ltar dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs kyi 'gal ba de lta bu 'dong na /
analyzed: 'di ltar dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs kyi 'gal ba de lta bu 'dong na /
translated: If you assert that the thesis and reason are contradictory in this way,

original: 'di tshar bcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di tshar bcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: then this is a basis for refutation.

original: yang na dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa mi 'dod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: yang na dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa mi 'dod pa de'i tshe /
translated: Or, if you do not assert that it is an observed object,

original: dam bca' dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dam bca' dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: then there is not the slightest contradiction between the thesis and the reason.

original: tha dad pa dag kyang dngos po 'ga' zhig las bskal ba dag tha dad pas mi dmigs pa yang tha dad pa'i dngos po nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa dag kyang dngos po 'ga' zhig las bskal ba dag tha dad pas mi dmigs pa yang tha dad pa'i dngos po nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because even different things are different from some other thing, and because difference is a real entity.

original: gang de skad du dam bca' ba rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba yang 'di nyid dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba yin no zhes bstan pa /
analyzed: gang de skad du dam bca' ba rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba yang 'di nyid dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba yin no zhes bstan pa /
translated: This is also taught by the statement that the thesis contradicts its own words.

original: de la 'di nyid tshar bcad pa'i @341a * //
analyzed: de la 'di nyid tshar bcad pa'i @341a * //
translated: This is a basis for refutation.

original: rten du gyur pa yin te sgrub pa'i yan lag ma yin pa dam bca' sgrub par byed pa'i tshig gi sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rten du gyur pa yin te sgrub pa'i yan lag ma yin pa dam bca' sgrub par byed pa'i tshig gi sbyor ba'o //
translated: It is a basis, but not a part of the proof, because it is a statement that establishes the thesis.

original: 'gal ba med de de'i rten nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba med de de'i rten nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no contradiction, because it is the basis of the thesis.

original: gal te de dam bca' la ma ltos par yang 'gal ba yin na rten du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de dam bca' la ma ltos par yang 'gal ba yin na rten du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were contradictory even without depending on the thesis, then it would be the basis.

original: dam bca' ba'i rten nyid gang yin pa de yang /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i rten nyid gang yin pa de yang /
translated: And that which is the basis of the thesis

original: sbyor ba byas pa de nyid kyis pham pa skyes te /
analyzed: sbyor ba byas pa de nyid kyis pham pa skyes te /
translated: is defeated by the very statement of the proof,

original: skabs su bab pa nye bar bsdu ba'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skabs su bab pa nye bar bsdu ba'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the conclusion of the relevant summary.

original: 'gal ba brjod pa don med pa can nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'gal ba brjod pa don med pa can nyid yin te /
translated: The statement of contradiction is pointless,

original: pham pa la pham pa med pa'i phyir thal bar byas pa rab tu sbyor ba bzhin no //
analyzed: pham pa la pham pa med pa'i phyir thal bar byas pa rab tu sbyor ba bzhin no //
translated: because there is no defeat of the defeated, like applying a reductio against one who has already been defeated.

original: gang du gang zhig rnam par dpyad pa'i zhar la bsgrub par bya ba gcig la gtan tshigs mang po brjod pa dag ni /
analyzed: gang du gang zhig rnam par dpyad pa'i zhar la bsgrub par bya ba gcig la gtan tshigs mang po brjod pa dag ni /
translated: Where many reasons are stated for a single probandum in the course of an analysis,

original: rnam par rtog pa'i sgo nas de bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa'i ched du 'jug pa'i phyir nus pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i sgo nas de bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa'i ched du 'jug pa'i phyir nus pa yin te /
translated: It is capable of proving the probandum because it engages in proving that by way of conception.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na gnyis po don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na gnyis po don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, both would be pointless.

original: gal te de la yang sbyor ba gcig med par gzhan du yang mi 'gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te de la yang sbyor ba gcig med par gzhan du yang mi 'gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: If it is not one application, then it would not be another.

original: gnyis pa sgrub par byed pa 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyis pa sgrub par byed pa 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: At that time, there is no second proof at all,

original: khong du ma chud pa bstan pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khong du ma chud pa bstan pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no teaching of what is not understood.

original: de'i phyir dam bca' ba dang rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba zhes bya ba'i tshar bcad pa'i gnas 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dam bca' ba dang rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba zhes bya ba'i tshar bcad pa'i gnas 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is not even a single occasion of refutation called ‚Äúcontradiction with a thesis and one‚Äôs own words.‚Äù

original: bdag med do zhes bya ba de la yang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag med do zhes bya ba de la yang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Also, in the statement ‚ÄúThere is no self,‚Äù there is no contradiction,

original: med do zhes bya ba'i bdag gi sgra'i don dngos po nye bar len pa nyid bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med do zhes bya ba'i bdag gi sgra'i don dngos po nye bar len pa nyid bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the word ‚Äúself‚Äù in ‚Äúdoes not exist‚Äù is negated as the referent of a thing.

original: sgra'i don 'gegs na ni 'gal bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: sgra'i don 'gegs na ni 'gal bar 'gyur na /
translated: If the referent of the word is negated, there would be a contradiction,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid sgra'i don yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid sgra'i don yang ma yin no //
translated: but the referent of the word is not an intrinsic identity.

original: gang yan gdam bcas pas gtan tshigs la gnod pa'i phyir gtan tshigs dang 'gal bar ston te /üîΩdper na thams cad tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: gang yan gdam bcas pas gtan tshigs la gnod pa'i phyir gtan tshigs dang 'gal bar ston te / dper na thams cad tha dad pa yin te /
translated: Since the reason contradicts the thesis, it is shown to be contradictory.üîΩ For example, it is like the statement, ‚ÄúAll are different because the term thing is applied to a collection.‚Äù

original: tshogs pa la dngos po'i sgra rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu 'di la dam bca' ba'i sbyor ba yang med cing gtan tshigs ci yang med na ci yis 'gal bar 'gyur /
analyzed: tshogs pa la dngos po'i sgra rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu 'di la dam bca' ba'i sbyor ba yang med cing gtan tshigs ci yang med na ci yis 'gal bar 'gyur /
translated: In this case, there is no application of a thesis and there is no reason at all, so what would be contradictory?

original: 'on kyang bstan pa'i don nye bar bshad pa'i sgo nas nye bar bsdu ba'i tshig ni de yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang bstan pa'i don nye bar bshad pa'i sgo nas nye bar bsdu ba'i tshig ni de yin te /
translated: However, the words of the summary are explained by the meaning of the teaching.

original: gtan tshigs gzhan dag nyid kyis sgra ni khyad par can gcig par rjod par byed pa ma yin pa dang / @341b sna tshogs pa'i don gyi spyi brjod par yang bstan pas /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan dag nyid kyis sgra ni khyad par can gcig par rjod par byed pa ma yin pa dang / @341b sna tshogs pa'i don gyi spyi brjod par yang bstan pas /
translated: Since other reasons are taught, sound is not said to be a single, specific thing, and it is also taught that it expresses the generality of a variety of objects.

original: sgra'i don thams cad sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dngos po gcig gi rang bzhin med par bstan nas 'ga' zhig la brten nas thams cad tha dad pa yin no zhes smras so //
analyzed: sgra'i don thams cad sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dngos po gcig gi rang bzhin med par bstan nas 'ga' zhig la brten nas thams cad tha dad pa yin no zhes smras so //
translated: Having taught that all words are not the nature of a single entity by way of their various natures, he says that all are different based on some [of them].

original: de dag gis ni 'gal ba bsal ba'o //
analyzed: de dag gis ni 'gal ba bsal ba'o //
translated: By these [words] he removes the contradiction.

original: gzhan yang dpe nye bar ston pa yang yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang dpe nye bar ston pa yang yin te /
translated: Moreover, he gives an example:

original: dper na sgra ni mi rtag ste /
analyzed: dper na sgra ni mi rtag ste /
translated: For example, sound is impermanent,

original: byas pa dag ni mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: byas pa dag ni mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: because what is produced is impermanent.

original: don 'ga' zhig la log par rtogs pa la don sna tshogs pa'i spyi rab tu grags pa'i sgra sbyor ba nye bar bstan nas /
analyzed: don 'ga' zhig la log par rtogs pa la don sna tshogs pa'i spyi rab tu grags pa'i sgra sbyor ba nye bar bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the application of a word that is well known as the universal of various objects to a mistaken understanding of some object,

original: log par rtogs pa'i gnas bstan nas spyir thams cad tha dad pa yin no zhes bya ba mjug sdud par byed do //
analyzed: log par rtogs pa'i gnas bstan nas spyir thams cad tha dad pa yin no zhes bya ba mjug sdud par byed do //
translated: having taught the basis of mistaken understanding, he concludes, All are different in general.

original: gal te dpe'i sbyor ba spyi'i phyir drang po kho nar de'i sbyor ba'i go rims bzhin du mi sbyor ba dang / log par rtogs pa'i yul yang mi ston zhes na /
analyzed: gal te dpe'i sbyor ba spyi'i phyir drang po kho nar de'i sbyor ba'i go rims bzhin du mi sbyor ba dang / log par rtogs pa'i yul yang mi ston zhes na /
translated: If you say that the example is applied in a straightforward way, in accordance with the order of the syllogism, because it is a general example, and that the object of wrong conception is not taught,

original: ma yin te bsdus nas bstan pa'i phyir dang / sgrub par byed pa'i tshig nyid ma yin pa'i yang phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te bsdus nas bstan pa'i phyir dang / sgrub par byed pa'i tshig nyid ma yin pa'i yang phyir ro //
translated: then we reply that it is not so, because it is taught in a condensed form, and because the words of the proof are not the same.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dam bca' bas gtan tshigs la gnod pa med pa dang / gcig nyid ni cung zad kyang med do zhes 'ga' zhig smra ba na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dam bca' bas gtan tshigs la gnod pa med pa dang / gcig nyid ni cung zad kyang med do zhes 'ga' zhig smra ba na /
translated: Therefore, the thesis does not contradict the reason, and when someone says that not even the slightest identity exists,

original: de bsdus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshogs pa gcig mi 'dod na /
analyzed: de bsdus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshogs pa gcig mi 'dod na /
translated: if he does not accept that the collection of the parts is the identity of the whole,

original: gang gis na 'gal bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis na 'gal bar 'gyur /
translated: then by what is the contradiction?

original: gang yang drug gis cig car sbyar ba la stsogs pas rdul phra rab tha dad smra ba yin te /
analyzed: gang yang drug gis cig car sbyar ba la stsogs pas rdul phra rab tha dad smra ba yin te /
translated: Also, some say that the atomists are those who apply the six, simultaneously, and so on,

original: de'i gcig tshogs pa'i rang bzhin du bsgrub par 'dod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i gcig tshogs pa'i rang bzhin du bsgrub par 'dod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: but they do not assert that the collection of the parts is the identity of the whole.

original: 'on kyang dngos po'i rang bzhin med pa nyid la gcig dang du ma dgag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang dngos po'i rang bzhin med pa nyid la gcig dang du ma dgag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But the nonexistence of the intrinsic reality of things is the negation of one and many.

original: de'i phyir de yang de'i tshogs pa 'dod ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de'i phyir de yang de'i tshogs pa 'dod ba ma yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, it is not maintained that it is a collection of those.

original: de la sgra yang ma yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de la sgra yang ma yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
translated: And since it is not sound, there is no contradiction.

original: 'di sngar gyi dam bca' dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba las tha dad pa med na gang gis tha dad par brjod /
analyzed: 'di sngar gyi dam bca' dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba las tha dad pa med na gang gis tha dad par brjod /
translated: If this is not different from the contradiction of thesis and reason, then why is it stated as a separate one?

original: gal te der ni gtan tshigs dang / dam bca' ba la gnod pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te der ni gtan tshigs dang / dam bca' ba la gnod pa yin no //
translated: If it is said that there is a contradiction of thesis and reason

original: 'dir dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs la yin pas tha dad pa yod do zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs la yin pas tha dad pa yod do zhe na /
translated: because it is said that there is a contradiction of thesis and reason here,

original: don la 'gal ba yod na ni gtan tshigs dang / dam bca' ba dag gnod byed kyi dngos por 'gyur na /
analyzed: don la 'gal ba yod na ni gtan tshigs dang / dam bca' ba dag gnod byed kyi dngos por 'gyur na /
translated: then if there is a contradiction in the meaning, the thesis and reason would be contradictory.

original: don 'gal ba de yang gnyis la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don 'gal ba de yang gnyis la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But that contradiction in meaning is based on two things.

original: gnyi ga la yang phan tshun gnod byed yin te /
analyzed: gnyi ga la yang phan tshun gnod byed yin te /
translated: Both are contradictory to each other,

original: don gcig yod na don gzhan med pa'i phyir @342a * //
analyzed: don gcig yod na don gzhan med pa'i phyir @342a * //
translated: because if one meaning exists, the other meaning does not exist.

original: ro ; / de la gtan tshigs dang dam bca' bdag gis 'gal ba'i dpe brjod pa /
analyzed: ro ; / de la gtan tshigs dang dam bca' bdag gis 'gal ba'i dpe brjod pa /
translated: The example that I give of the contradiction between the reason and the thesis is this:

original: lhan cig gam tha dad pa dag la don tha dad pa ni cung zad med do //
analyzed: lhan cig gam tha dad pa dag la don tha dad pa ni cung zad med do //
translated: There is not the slightest difference in meaning between the simultaneous and the different.

original: gzhan yang 'di la 'gal ba dang mi 'gal pa sems pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di la 'gal ba dang mi 'gal pa sems pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, there is no consideration here of contradiction or non-contradiction,

original: gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba yod na rten tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba yod na rten tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because when there is the application of the reason, there is a difference in the substratum.

original: ma grub pa zhes bya ba gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid ni 'dir tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: ma grub pa zhes bya ba gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid ni 'dir tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no //
translated: The unestablished reason is the occasion for defeat here.

original: de nges par brjod par 'gyur ba nyid de'i chos gzhan gyis chos de nyid rtogs par bstan pas pham pa 'dren par byed do //
analyzed: de nges par brjod par 'gyur ba nyid de'i chos gzhan gyis chos de nyid rtogs par bstan pas pham pa 'dren par byed do //
translated: It is certainly to be stated, because the opponent is led to defeat by the demonstration of that very property of the reason by another property.

original: pham pa de la de'i don dang 'gal ba'i dpyod pa cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: pham pa de la de'i don dang 'gal ba'i dpyod pa cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And in that defeat, there is not the slightest analysis of the meaning of that.

original: gzhan yang thams cad du dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs kyi 'gal ba 'dir 'gyur na /
analyzed: gzhan yang thams cad du dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs kyi 'gal ba 'dir 'gyur na /
translated: Moreover, if this contradiction between the thesis and the reason occurs everywhere,

original: gtan tshigs kyi skyon gyi rigs rnam pa gnyis po 'gal ba nyid dang ma grub ba de las mi 'da'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi skyon gyi rigs rnam pa gnyis po 'gal ba nyid dang ma grub ba de las mi 'da'o //
translated: The two types of fallacious reasons do not go beyond contradiction and nonestablishment.

original: chos can la yod pa'i gtan tshigs 'gal ba grub pa des /
analyzed: chos can la yod pa'i gtan tshigs 'gal ba grub pa des /
translated: A reason that is contradictory because it is present in only the dissimilar instances

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos bzlog pa yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos bzlog pa yin te /
translated: reverses the probandum.

original: dam bca' ba'i don dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i don dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it contradicts the meaning of the thesis.

original: bsgrub pa nyid kyang chos can la dam bca' ba'i don grub na gcig de la 'gal ba'i rang bzhin dag mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub pa nyid kyang chos can la dam bca' ba'i don grub na gcig de la 'gal ba'i rang bzhin dag mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Also, the proof is that if the meaning of the thesis were established in the subject, then it would be impossible for the two contradictory natures to be present there.

original: rnam pa gzhan ltar na ni 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan ltar na ni 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: If it were otherwise, then there would be no contradiction.

original: gal te chos can rang bzhin ma grub pa la gtan tshigs dang dam bcas pa brjod pa dag la 'gal ba yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te chos can rang bzhin ma grub pa la gtan tshigs dang dam bcas pa brjod pa dag la 'gal ba yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is a contradiction in stating the reason and the thesis when the nature of the subject is not established,

original: chos can la tshad ma dang 'brel ba med na yang /
analyzed: chos can la tshad ma dang 'brel ba med na yang /
translated: then even though the subject is not related to a valid cognition,

original: gnyi ga the tshom du gyur pa de ltar na yang /
analyzed: gnyi ga the tshom du gyur pa de ltar na yang /
translated: both parties have a doubt about it.

original: chos can la gtan tshigs yod par the tshom za ba'i ma grub pa nyid kyang gtan tshigs kyi skyon ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can la gtan tshigs yod par the tshom za ba'i ma grub pa nyid kyang gtan tshigs kyi skyon ma yin no //
translated: The reason is not faulty if there is doubt about the presence of the reason in the subject.

original: ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dag las gzhan dam bcas pa gtan tshigs 'gal ba zhes bya ba'i pham pa'i rgyu yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dag las gzhan dam bcas pa gtan tshigs 'gal ba zhes bya ba'i pham pa'i rgyu yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Apart from the unestablished and the contradictory, there is no other reason that is a cause of defeat called ‚Äúcontradictory reason.‚Äù

original: ma grub pa dang 'gal ba ni /
analyzed: ma grub pa dang 'gal ba ni /
translated: The unestablished and the contradictory

original: gtan tshigs ltar sdang bar brjod pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar sdang bar brjod pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: are taught to be like a reason that is declared to be faulty.

original: dam bcas pa dang gtan tshigs kyi 'gal ba tha dad du brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dam bcas pa dang gtan tshigs kyi 'gal ba tha dad du brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the contradiction between the thesis and the reason should not be stated separately.

original: gal te 'gal ba gnyi ga la brten pa yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te 'gal ba gnyi ga la brten pa yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: If you say that because the contradiction is based on both,

original: smra bar 'dod pas cig shos ston par 'dod pa yin zhe na /üîΩdam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: smra bar 'dod pas cig shos ston par 'dod pa yin zhe na / dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba zhes bya ba /
translated: then the proponent wishes to state the other,üîΩthen the contradiction between the thesis and the reasonüîΩis based on both the thesis and the reason.

original: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs la @342b brten pa gnyi ga la yang brten par 'gyur ba de ni bden te /
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs la @342b brten pa gnyi ga la yang brten par 'gyur ba de ni bden te /
translated: That is true.

original: de la gang gi tshe dam bca' ba dang 'gal bar 'dod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de la gang gi tshe dam bca' ba dang 'gal bar 'dod pa de'i tshe /
translated: When it is asserted that the reason contradicts the thesis,

original: gtan tshigs 'gal ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'gal ba zhes bya'o //
translated: then it is called a contradictory reason.

original: de bas na dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba'i skyon med par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba'i skyon med par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be stated without error that the thesis is contradictory and the reason is contradictory.

original: de la gtan tshigs dpe ni /
analyzed: de la gtan tshigs dpe ni /
translated: Here, an example of a contradictory reason is

original: sgra rtag ste skye ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang / dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba ni bdag med ces bya ba dang / dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs phan tshun 'gal ba'i dpe ni /
analyzed: sgra rtag ste skye ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang / dam bca' ba dang 'gal ba ni bdag med ces bya ba dang / dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs phan tshun 'gal ba'i dpe ni /
translated: ‚ÄúSound is permanent because it is a product,‚Äù and an example of a thesis that contradicts the reason is ‚ÄúThere is no self.‚Äù An example of a thesis and reason that are mutually contradictory is

original: yon tan las tha dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / dam bcas pa gtan tshigs la 'gal ba'i dpe ni dngos po gcig yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o zhe na /
analyzed: yon tan las tha dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / dam bcas pa gtan tshigs la 'gal ba'i dpe ni dngos po gcig yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúThe self is different from the qualities‚Äù and so on. An example of a thesis that contradicts the reason is ‚ÄúOne thing does not exist‚Äù and so on.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: ji skad du sngar bshad pa'i gtan tshigs la ltos pa'i 'gal ba ni /
analyzed: ji skad du sngar bshad pa'i gtan tshigs la ltos pa'i 'gal ba ni /
translated: The contradiction that depends on the reason explained aboveüîΩis not a contradiction that depends on the thesis.

original: thams cad la gtan tshigs ltar snang ba las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro //üîΩltos pa med pa rang nyid 'ba' zhig dam bca' ba dang 'gal bar 'dod pa la /
analyzed: thams cad la gtan tshigs ltar snang ba las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro // ltos pa med pa rang nyid 'ba' zhig dam bca' ba dang 'gal bar 'dod pa la /
translated: Because all of these are not beyond being fallacious reasons.üîΩWith regard to the assertion that the reason is contradictory to the thesis when there is no reliance on the thesis,

original: dam bca' bas gtan tshigs 'gal ba zhes bya ba gtan tshigs smos pa dang 'brel ba med cing /
analyzed: dam bca' bas gtan tshigs 'gal ba zhes bya ba gtan tshigs smos pa dang 'brel ba med cing /
translated: the statement of the reason is not related to the thesis,

original: skye ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir rtag pa'o zhes bya pa 'di la yang gtan tshigs 'gal bar rigs pa ma yin te /üîΩdam bcas pas gtan tshigs la gnod pa ni /
analyzed: skye ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir rtag pa'o zhes bya pa 'di la yang gtan tshigs 'gal bar rigs pa ma yin te / dam bcas pas gtan tshigs la gnod pa ni /
translated: and it is not logical for the reason to be contradictory in ‚ÄúIt is permanent because it has the property of being produced.‚Äù

original: gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin pa yin na /üîΩ'dir ni gtan tshigs kyi dam bca' ba la gnod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin pa yin na / 'dir ni gtan tshigs kyi dam bca' ba la gnod pa'i phyir /
translated: If the reason is contradictory to the thesis because the thesis contradicts the reason,üîΩhere the thesis contradicts the reason,

original: dam bca' ba dang 'gal bar mi rigs so //
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang 'gal bar mi rigs so //
translated: so it is not logical for the reason to be contradictory to the thesis.

original: gnyis ka la brten pa'i 'gal ba yang /üîΩgnod par bya ba la ltos nas /
analyzed: gnyis ka la brten pa'i 'gal ba yang / gnod par bya ba la ltos nas /
translated: Also, with regard to the contradiction that is based on both,

original: 'gal bar gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal bar gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the contradiction is posited in reliance on the object of refutation,üîΩit is not a contradiction that is based on both.

original: ji skad du bshad pa de dag gis kyang bzhad ged  pa ri mo 'dri ba'i tshul du dam bca' ba dang dpe 'gal ba la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa de dag gis kyang bzhad ged  pa ri mo 'dri ba'i tshul du dam bca' ba dang dpe 'gal ba la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should also state the thesis and example that are contradictory to what has been explained.

original: de la yang phyogs su byas pa'i chos bzlog pa dang ldan pas dpe la 'gal bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: de la yang phyogs su byas pa'i chos bzlog pa dang ldan pas dpe la 'gal bar 'gyur na /
translated: Moreover, when the property of the subject is reversed and possessed, there is a contradiction in the example.

original: 'gal ba'i dpe la /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i dpe la /
translated: In the case of a contradictory example,

original: phyogs kyi chos yod cing gzhan dang thun mong du ma gyur pa rab tu bsgrubs pa de'i tshe 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos yod cing gzhan dang thun mong du ma gyur pa rab tu bsgrubs pa de'i tshe 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no //
translated: when the property of the subject is present and not shared with others, and is well established, then it is a seemingly contradictory reason.

original: rab tu ma bsgrubs pa nyid thun mong du 'jug pa'i nges pa'am /üîΩ'jug pa @343a * //
analyzed: rab tu ma bsgrubs pa nyid thun mong du 'jug pa'i nges pa'am / 'jug pa @343a * //
translated: If it is not well established, it is a common inconclusive reason.

original: med na thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: med na thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa'o //
translated: If it is not engaged, it is a non-common inconclusive reason.

original: gal te 'gal ba'i dpe la mi 'jug cing ldog pa la 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs la /
analyzed: gal te 'gal ba'i dpe la mi 'jug cing ldog pa la 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs la /
translated: If in a contradictory example, the reason is not engaged but is engaged in the reversal,

original: gtan tshigs kyi skyon cung zad kyang med cing dam bca' ba dang dpe'i 'gal ba cung zad yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi skyon cung zad kyang med cing dam bca' ba dang dpe'i 'gal ba cung zad yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: then there is not the slightest fault in the reason, and there is the slightest contradiction between the thesis and example.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: de yang the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs nyid ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdpe dang 'gal ba'i dam bca' ba dang mthun pa'i skyon yin gyi /
analyzed: de yang the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs nyid ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro // dpe dang 'gal ba'i dam bca' ba dang mthun pa'i skyon yin gyi /
translated: because that reason is also inconclusive, since it is doubtful.üîΩThe fault of the thesis contradicting the example is

original: chos mi mthun pa'i ni ma yin te /
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa'i ni ma yin te /
translated: not the fault of the dissimilar example,

original: mngon par 'dod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is just what is intended.

original: chos mthun pa nyid can gyi dpe la phyin ci log pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid can gyi dpe la phyin ci log pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni /
translated: The example that has the property of the similar instance, but has the opposite property,

original: dngos po la bsgrub par bya ba la 'khrul ba ma yin pa dang / gtan tshigs 'khrul ba med pa'i chos nyid ston par mi nus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po la bsgrub par bya ba la 'khrul ba ma yin pa dang / gtan tshigs 'khrul ba med pa'i chos nyid ston par mi nus pa'i phyir /
translated: is not mistaken with regard to the probandum, because it cannot show the property of the reason that is nonmistaken.

original: gtan tshigs 'brel pa ma bstan pa las nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'brel pa ma bstan pa las nges pa ma yin te /
translated: The reason is not ascertained from the nondemonstration of the relation,üîΩbecause of that.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: dam bca' ba dang dpe'i 'gal ba yang /
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang dpe'i 'gal ba yang /
translated: the contradiction of the thesis and the example

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba las 'das ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba las 'das ba ma yin no //
translated: is not beyond being a fallacious reason.

original: gal te rnam pa gnyi ga ltar na yang skyon yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa gnyi ga ltar na yang skyon yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is the case that there is a fault in both ways,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: then no.

original: khyad par du bsgrub pa'i yan lag gi go rims kyi nges pa'i rgol ba ni gtan tshigs kyi skyon sngar chags pa'i sgo nas pham pa ni skyon gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par du bsgrub pa'i yan lag gi go rims kyi nges pa'i rgol ba ni gtan tshigs kyi skyon sngar chags pa'i sgo nas pham pa ni skyon gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In particular, the objection that the order of the branches of proof is not definite is defeated by the fault of the reason already being stated, because it does not depend on another fault.

original: dpe dang chos mthun pa nyid gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid yin la /
analyzed: dpe dang chos mthun pa nyid gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid yin la /
translated: The similarity of the example to the property is the definition of the reason.

original: 'gal ba dpe la yod pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: 'gal ba dpe la yod pa ma yin pas /
translated: The contradiction is not in the example.

original: sngar bstan pa'i gtan tshigs kyi skyon gyis pham pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sngar bstan pa'i gtan tshigs kyi skyon gyis pham pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, it is defeated by the previously stated fault of the reason.

original: phyis dpe la ltos pa'i 'gal ba dpyod pa rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyis dpe la ltos pa'i 'gal ba dpyod pa rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not right to analyze the contradiction that depends on the example later.

original: gtan tshigs kyang dpe dang 'gal ba /üîΩgal te thun mong ma yin pa ni gnyi ga la mi 'jug pa dang 'gal ba nyid kyang /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyang dpe dang 'gal ba / gal te thun mong ma yin pa ni gnyi ga la mi 'jug pa dang 'gal ba nyid kyang /
translated: The reason is contradictory to the example.üîΩIf it is not shared, it does not apply to both.

original: gal te chos mi mthun pa la 'jug na'o //
analyzed: gal te chos mi mthun pa la 'jug na'o //
translated: If it is contradictory, it applies to dissimilar instances.

original: gtan tshigs tshad ma dang 'gal ba ni /
analyzed: gtan tshigs tshad ma dang 'gal ba ni /

original: dper na mi sreg par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dper na mi sreg par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: For example, it is not a burner.

original: grang pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang pa'o //
analyzed: grang pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang pa'o //

original: dam bca' ba dang tshad ma 'gal ba ni /
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang tshad ma 'gal ba ni /
translated: Contradiction of the thesis and the means of knowledge

original: rang gi tshig gi sgo nas bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi tshig gi sgo nas bshad pa yin no //

original: sgrub par byed pa de dag thams cad gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dag gi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa de dag thams cad gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dag gi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all of these proofs are included among the fallacious reasons.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i tshig nyid kyi sgo nas bstan to //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i tshig nyid kyi sgo nas bstan to //

original: gang yang rgol ba'i lan gzhan gyi phyogs la /
analyzed: gang yang rgol ba'i lan gzhan gyi phyogs la /
translated: The response to the opponent‚Äôs position

original: ba lang nyid la sogs pa @343b rang la grub pa'i sgo nas ma nges pa de ni /
analyzed: ba lang nyid la sogs pa @343b rang la grub pa'i sgo nas ma nges pa de ni /

original: 'brel yod pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: 'brel yod pa nyid ma yin te /

original: gang gi tshe ba lang nyid la sogs pa rang la grub pa'i sgo nas gzhan la 'khrul bar sgrub par 'dod par 'gyur na /üîΩde rang gi phyogs dang 'gal bar mi 'dod pa'i phyir /

original: 'gal bar rigs pa ma yin no//
analyzed: 'gal bar rigs pa ma yin no//

original: gang gi phyir de rang nyid khas len pa'i ba lang nyid la gtan tshigs 'jug pa'i phyir /

analyzed: the tshom du gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa med pa de ltar ston par byed do //

original: gtan tshigs de yang /üîΩba lang nyid la sogs pa yod pa'am /
analyzed: gtan tshigs de yang / ba lang nyid la sogs pa yod pa'am /

original: de yang rang mngon par 'dod pa /

analyzed: rtag pa ba lang nyid la 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs mi rtag pa nyid du brjod pa na /

analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag bsgrubs pa med pas /

original: logs shig tu tshar bcad pa'i gnas su ma brjod do zhes bstan pa ;
analyzed: logs shig tu tshar bcad pa'i gnas su ma brjod do zhes bstan pa ;
translated: It is not taught that it is a separate part that is refuted.

original: de yang yan lag gzhan smra bas rigs pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de yang yan lag gzhan smra bas rigs pa ma yin la /
translated: Moreover, it is not logical for the proponent of other parts to say that.

original: gang yang gtan tshigs las dpe yan lag logs shig tu smra ba de ni gtan tshigs ltar snang bar bstan pas /
analyzed: gang yang gtan tshigs las dpe yan lag logs shig tu smra ba de ni gtan tshigs ltar snang bar bstan pas /
translated: Also, it is not logical to say that the example is a separate part from the reason, because it is taught that it is a seemingly correct reason.

original: dpe ltar snang ba bstan par rigs pa ma yin te /üîΩde'i tshig gi sgo nas khong du chud par bya ba de bas sgrub @344a * //
analyzed: dpe ltar snang ba bstan par rigs pa ma yin te / de'i tshig gi sgo nas khong du chud par bya ba de bas sgrub @344a * //
translated: It is not logical to teach that it is a seemingly correct example.

original: par byed pa gzhan med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: par byed pa gzhan med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is to be understood through its words, it follows that there is no other proof.

original: dpe ltar snang ba dag / gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dag gi nang du 'dus na /
analyzed: dpe ltar snang ba dag / gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dag gi nang du 'dus na /
translated: If seemingly correct examples are included among seemingly correct reasons,

original: dpe yang gtan tshigs kyi nang du 'dus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpe yang gtan tshigs kyi nang du 'dus par 'gyur ro //
translated: then examples would be included among reasons.

original: de ltar na yang dpe logs shig tu sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu mi 'gyur te ;
analyzed: de ltar na yang dpe logs shig tu sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu mi 'gyur te ;
translated: Even so, an example would not be a separate part of the proof,

original: logs shig tu 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: logs shig tu 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would not be engaged separately.

original: dpes bsgrub par bya ba'i don gyi gang yin pa de ni gtan tshigs kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir gtan tshigs bsgrubs pas /üîΩdpe logs shig tu bsgrubs pa ni med do //
analyzed: dpes bsgrub par bya ba'i don gyi gang yin pa de ni gtan tshigs kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir gtan tshigs bsgrubs pas / dpe logs shig tu bsgrubs pa ni med do //
translated: Because the meaning of the example is included within the proof, the example is not established separately.

original: gzhan yang rgol ba phyogs snga ma gtan tshigs ltar snang ba 'brel pa med pa tshar bcad pa'i gnas su rigs pa ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yang rgol ba phyogs snga ma gtan tshigs ltar snang ba 'brel pa med pa tshar bcad pa'i gnas su rigs pa ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, there is no reason whatsoever to refute the opponent‚Äôs position that a fallacious reason is unrelated.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba de dang 'brel pa thams cad tshig gi sgo nas bstan pas logs shig tu bshad par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba de dang 'brel pa thams cad tshig gi sgo nas bstan pas logs shig tu bshad par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, all fallacious reasons and their relations are taught through the words of the treatise and do not need to be explained separately.

original: don gzhan go bar byed pa la sogs pa gtan tshigs la nus pa med pa nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gzhan go bar byed pa la sogs pa gtan tshigs la nus pa med pa nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no capacity in a reason to make one understand a different meaning.

original: 'ga' zhig gtan tshigs la nus pa nyid kyang /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gtan tshigs la nus pa nyid kyang /
translated: Even if a reason has the capacity to prove something,

original: bsgrub par bya ba la don gzhan khong du chud pa rtsom par mi byed de /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba la don gzhan khong du chud pa rtsom par mi byed de /
translated: it does not commence to prove a different meaning.

original: nus pa med pa'i log pa'i 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa med pa'i log pa'i 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would be a mistaken engagement that lacks the capacity to do so.

original: phyogs dgag pa la dam bca' ba'i don sel ba ni /
analyzed: phyogs dgag pa la dam bca' ba'i don sel ba ni /
translated: In the case of refuting a position, the meaning of the thesis is eliminated.

original: dam bca' ba'i don sel ba ste /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i don sel ba ste /
translated: The meaning of the thesis is eliminated.

original: gang gi dam bca' ba'i don ni sgra mi rtag pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi dam bca' ba'i don ni sgra mi rtag pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the thesis is that sound is impermanent.

original: dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba /
translated: The reason is that it is perceptible by the senses.

original: spyi la 'jug pas 'khrul par bstan pas dgag pa bya ba la /
analyzed: spyi la 'jug pas 'khrul par bstan pas dgag pa bya ba la /
translated: Since the general is engaged, it is taught to be mistaken.

original: su zhig 'di ltar mi rtag par smra zhes nas /
analyzed: su zhig 'di ltar mi rtag par smra zhes nas /
translated: Who would say impermanent in this way?

original: yongs su dor bar byed pa de'i dam bca' ba bsal ba de ni tshar gcad pa'i gnas ma yin no //
analyzed: yongs su dor bar byed pa de'i dam bca' ba bsal ba de ni tshar gcad pa'i gnas ma yin no //
translated: Rejecting it, the elimination of the thesis is not a basis for refutation.

original: 'dir yang gang gi tshe gtan tshigs 'khrul pa brjod pas kyang mthun pa'i phyogs yongs su btang ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'dir yang gang gi tshe gtan tshigs 'khrul pa brjod pas kyang mthun pa'i phyogs yongs su btang ba ma yin nam /
translated: Here, when a mistaken reason is stated, is the similar class not abandoned?

original: ci'i phyir tshar bcad pa'i gnas ma yin /
analyzed: ci'i phyir tshar bcad pa'i gnas ma yin /
translated: Why is it not a basis for refutation?

original: gal te gtan tshigs ltar snang ba brjod pas tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs ltar snang ba brjod pas tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is a basis for refutation by stating a seemingly reasonable reason,

original: 'dir da ni dam bca' ba bsal ba'i lan la ltos pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: 'dir da ni dam bca' ba bsal ba'i lan la ltos pas ci zhig bya /
translated: then what is the use of relying on an answer to the elimination of the thesis here now?

original: de'i de nyid thog mar tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i de nyid thog mar tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is the first place to be refuted.

original: gzhan yongs su bgrang mi nus shing /
analyzed: gzhan yongs su bgrang mi nus shing /
translated: And it is impossible to enumerate all the others.

original: rmongs pa rab tu smra ba'i byed pa nye bar 'dod pa dag gis ci de lta bu byed pa ni @344b shin tu thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rmongs pa rab tu smra ba'i byed pa nye bar 'dod pa dag gis ci de lta bu byed pa ni @344b shin tu thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: But if the deluded one who is the proponent of the thesis wishes to assert that such a thesis is tenable,

original: phyogs bkag pa la mi smra bar gyar na /üîΩmi smra ba zhes bya ba tshar bcad pa'i gnas dang / bros par gyur pa la /
analyzed: phyogs bkag pa la mi smra bar gyar na / mi smra ba zhes bya ba tshar bcad pa'i gnas dang / bros par gyur pa la /
translated: then when the opponent refutes the thesis,üîΩif the proponent remains silent,üîΩthen the proponent loses the debate by remaining silent.üîΩAnd if the proponent flees,üîΩthen the proponent loses the debate by fleeing.

original: rab tu bros pa zhes bya ba'i tshar gcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yang brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab tu bros pa zhes bya ba'i tshar gcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yang brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: And so on.

original: de'i phyir 'di yang 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di yang 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: Therefore this is also not a proper response.

original: gtan tshigs khyad par med pa bkag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: gtan tshigs khyad par med pa bkag pa bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the refutation of the reason that is not distinguished,

original: khyad par 'dod pa nyid ni gtan tshigs gzhan yin te /
analyzed: khyad par 'dod pa nyid ni gtan tshigs gzhan yin te /
translated: now, the distinction that is asserted is itself a different reason.

original: dper na gsal ba 'di dag ni rang bzhin gcig pa yin la /
analyzed: dper na gsal ba 'di dag ni rang bzhin gcig pa yin la /
translated: For example, these manifestations have the same nature

original: tshad yod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: tshad yod pa'i phyir te /
translated: because they are limited.

original: 'di lta bu'i 'khrul ba sun dbyung ba la gnas pas smras pa /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i 'khrul ba sun dbyung ba la gnas pas smras pa /
translated: In response to this, the opponent might say,

original: rang bzhin gcig dang 'brel ba'i yongs su gyur pa'i tshad mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig dang 'brel ba'i yongs su gyur pa'i tshad mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause we see that the transformation of a single nature is limited.‚Äù

original: 'ji ba'i rang bzhin can gyi kham phor la sogs pa dag la tshad mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'ji ba'i rang bzhin can gyi kham phor la sogs pa dag la tshad mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: Because we see that the transformation of a single nature, such as a clay pot, is limited.

original: bde dang sdug bsngal dang / ma rig pa dang 'brel ba'i rang bzhin gcig dang 'brel pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i tshad yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde dang sdug bsngal dang / ma rig pa dang 'brel ba'i rang bzhin gcig dang 'brel pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i tshad yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because we see that the transformation of a single nature that is related to pleasure, pain, and ignorance is limited.

original: gsal ba 'di dag thams cad dang ldan pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsal ba 'di dag thams cad dang ldan pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: All of these manifest things would be apprehended as possessing that.

original: de'i rang bzhin sna tshogs pa de rang bzhin gcig dag la tshad mthong ba'i bya bas /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin sna tshogs pa de rang bzhin gcig dag la tshad mthong ba'i bya bas /
translated: Because of the activity of seeing that the various natures of that are limited in a single nature,

original: rang bzhin gcig dang 'brel pa yongs su gyur pa'i tshad mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig dang 'brel pa yongs su gyur pa'i tshad mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because we see that the transformation of a single nature that is related is limited.

original: 'khrul pa de lta bu sun phyung nas /
analyzed: 'khrul pa de lta bu sun phyung nas /
translated: Having refuted such a mistake,

original: de'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo dang 'brel ba med pa'i rang bzhin gcig yin zhes smras la /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo dang 'brel ba med pa'i rang bzhin gcig yin zhes smras la /
translated: the opponent might say, ‚ÄúIt is a single nature that is not related to that essence.‚Äù

original: de 'dir khyad par med par bstan nas /
analyzed: de 'dir khyad par med par bstan nas /
translated: Here, having taught that there is no difference between them,

original: gtan tshigs dgag pa la khyad par smra na ni /
analyzed: gtan tshigs dgag pa la khyad par smra na ni /
translated: if one asserts a difference in the refutation of the reason,

original: gtan tshigs gzhan yod na yang gtan tshigs snga ma sgrub par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan yod na yang gtan tshigs snga ma sgrub par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: then even if there is another reason, because the former reason is still a proof,

original: tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no zhe na /
translated: it is a ground for defeat.

original: 'di la yang gtan tshigs snga ma nyid ma nges par brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di la yang gtan tshigs snga ma nyid ma nges par brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Here, because the former reason is stated as being unestablished,

original: sun phyung ba'i rgol ba la gtan tshigs gzhan dpyod pa'i nye bar sbyor bas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: sun phyung ba'i rgol ba la gtan tshigs gzhan dpyod pa'i nye bar sbyor bas ci zhig bya /
translated: what is the point of applying another reason to a defeated opponent?

original: 'di ltar rgol ba sngar sgrub par byed pa gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid du bstan pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar rgol ba sngar sgrub par byed pa gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid du bstan pa /
translated: Thus, the opponent is defeated by the former reason being taught as unestablished,

original: lan gyi skabs 'byed pa de nyid kyis sun byung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: lan gyi skabs 'byed pa de nyid kyis sun byung bar 'gyur la /
translated: and by the opportunity for a response being given.

original: 'on te skabs mi 'byed de gtan tshigs gzhan rjod par byed na yang tshar gcad pa'i 'os yin te /
analyzed: 'on te skabs mi 'byed de gtan tshigs gzhan rjod par byed na yang tshar gcad pa'i 'os yin te /
translated: But if one does not give an opportunity and states another reason, then that is also a ground for defeat,

original: rdzogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not complete.

original: rnal ma'i don las 'brel ba med pa'i don gzhan yin te /
analyzed: rnal ma'i don las 'brel ba med pa'i don gzhan yin te /
translated: It is a different point that is unrelated to the original point.

original: @345a * // ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyogs dang gnyen po yongs su gzung zhing gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub bya sgrub par byed na yang slar smra ba ni sgra rtag ste reg par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //üîΩgtan tshigs zhes bya ba yang skad kyi byings la ho no ste tu'o rkyen bya ba'i mtha' can gyi tshig ni ming dang / a'a khy'a ta dang nye bar bsgyur ba dang / ni ba ta zhes bya ba skabs ma yin pa'i ming la stsogs ba 'di /
analyzed: @345a * // ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyogs dang gnyen po yongs su gzung zhing gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub bya sgrub par byed na yang slar smra ba ni sgra rtag ste reg par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so // gtan tshigs zhes bya ba yang skad kyi byings la ho no ste tu'o rkyen bya ba'i mtha' can gyi tshig ni ming dang / a'a khy'a ta dang nye bar bsgyur ba dang / ni ba ta zhes bya ba skabs ma yin pa'i ming la stsogs ba 'di /
translated: The opponent's position is as follows: Sound is permanent because it is not tangible.üîΩ The term hetu is a verbal root meaning to be with the suffix tu added.üîΩThe term arthƒÅntara is a case of a name ending in a negative particle, which is a type of non-primary nominal stem.

original: don gzhan zhes bya ba tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa'i don 'brel ba med pa nyid kyi phyir phyogs snga ma dang / phyi ma'i rgol ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba de rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan zhes bya ba tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa'i don 'brel ba med pa nyid kyi phyir phyogs snga ma dang / phyi ma'i rgol ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba de rigs pa yin te /
translated: The opponent's position is a basis for refutation because the meaning of the thesis is unrelated to the reason. It is reasonable to say that the opponent's position is a basis for refutation by the prior and subsequent statements of the opponent.

original: skyon ston par byed pa gnyug ma bor nas sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag brjod pa med pa'i phyir dang / skyon brjod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyon ston par byed pa gnyug ma bor nas sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag brjod pa med pa'i phyir dang / skyon brjod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the proponent of the proof does not state a branch of the proof that abandons the innate and reveals faults, and because he does not state faults.

original: sgrub ba smra bas sgrub pa bkod pa ste /
analyzed: sgrub ba smra bas sgrub pa bkod pa ste /
translated: The proponent of the proof states the proof.

original: bsgrub par bya ba yin pa la de ma byas par gzhan zhar la 'ongs pa'am /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba yin pa la de ma byas par gzhan zhar la 'ongs pa'am /
translated: If he does not state the proof, but instead states something else that is extraneous to the proof,

original: zhar la 'ongs pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: zhar la 'ongs pa ma yin pas /
translated: or something that is not extraneous to the proof,

original: de med na med pa ma yin pa can rjod par byed pa ni pham pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: de med na med pa ma yin pa can rjod par byed pa ni pham pa'i gnas so //
translated: but which does not necessarily occur when the probandum occurs, then he is defeated.

original: rgol ba phyi ma'i skyon brjod pa tsam las gzhan nye bar brjod pa yang ngo //
analyzed: rgol ba phyi ma'i skyon brjod pa tsam las gzhan nye bar brjod pa yang ngo //
translated: He is also defeated if he merely states the faults of the opponent without stating the proof.

original: yi ge'i go rims ston pa dang 'dra bar don med pa yin te /
analyzed: yi ge'i go rims ston pa dang 'dra bar don med pa yin te /
translated: He is defeated if he states the proof in a meaningless order,üîΩlike this:

original: dper na sgra rtag ste /
analyzed: dper na sgra rtag ste /
translated: ‚ÄúSound is permanent,

original: dza pa ga da da nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dza pa ga da da nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of being zha pa ga da da.‚ÄùüîΩOr like this:

original: dzha bha ghadha dha /
analyzed: dzha bha ghadha dha /
translated: ‚Äúzha bha gha dha dha.‚Äù

original: lta bu'o zhes bya ba sgrub par byed pa ma bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩtshar gcad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: lta bu'o zhes bya ba sgrub par byed pa ma bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩtshar gcad par bya ba yin no //
translated: Because he does not state the proof.

original: 'brel ba med pa nyid de 'di yang yi ge'i go rims bstan pa nyid 'dod pa'i don grub pa la don med pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: 'brel ba med pa nyid de 'di yang yi ge'i go rims bstan pa nyid 'dod pa'i don grub pa la don med pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: It is not meaningless to state the order of the letters in order to establish the desired meaning.

original: gang la sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa brjod pa de nyid kyang don med pa yin te /
analyzed: gang la sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa brjod pa de nyid kyang don med pa yin te /
translated: It is meaningless to state that which is not a part of the proof.

original: bsgrub bya sgrub pa la nye bar sbyor ba brjod par bya ba don med pa'i phyir dang / dgos ba med pa'i phyir dang / khyad par gyi rnam pa khas len pa ni 'brel pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub pa la nye bar sbyor ba brjod par bya ba don med pa'i phyir dang / dgos ba med pa'i phyir dang / khyad par gyi rnam pa khas len pa ni 'brel pa med pa yin no //
translated: It is meaningless to state that which is not useful for establishing the probandum, because it is useless and because it is unrelated to the particular aspect that is accepted.

original: gal te 'dra ba khas blangs pa'i phyir skyon yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'dra ba khas blangs pa'i phyir skyon yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you accept that it is similar, there is no error.

original: yi ge'i go rims bstan pa dang 'dra ba 'dir khas blangs pas de gzhan las kyang med pa 'dzin pa'i phyir skyon med do zhes bya ba de ltar ni 'gyur te /
analyzed: yi ge'i go rims bstan pa dang 'dra ba 'dir khas blangs pas de gzhan las kyang med pa 'dzin pa'i phyir skyon med do zhes bya ba de ltar ni 'gyur te /
translated: If you accept that the order of the letters is similar to this, then there is no error because it is apprehended from another.

original: do na gzhan la sogs pa tshar gcad par bya ba'i gnas su ma brjod par thal bar 'gyur ba yin pas de ltar ni logs shig @345b tu brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: do na gzhan la sogs pa tshar gcad par bya ba'i gnas su ma brjod par thal bar 'gyur ba yin pas de ltar ni logs shig @345b tu brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: It follows that the other faults, etc., are not stated as grounds for refutation, and so they are not stated separately.

original: don med pa nyid du brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don med pa nyid du brjod pa'i phyir ro //

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa la /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa la /

original: 'di don med pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di don med pa can ma yin te /
translated: then it is not pointless.

original: gang la don cung zad med pa de nyid don med par 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang la don cung zad med pa de nyid don med par 'dod pa yin no zhe na /

original: gang rgol ba ma yin pa 'ga' don med par brjod pa ci'i phyir tshar gcad par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang rgol ba ma yin pa 'ga' don med par brjod pa ci'i phyir tshar gcad par bya ba ma yin te /

analyzed: tshar gcad pa'i rgyu mtshan du bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //

original: gal te de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te de ni ma yin te /

original: 'dir gnas skabs ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir gnas skabs ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /

original: 'di don med par smra ba gang yin pa de de nyid kyis tshar gcad par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di don med par smra ba gang yin pa de de nyid kyis tshar gcad par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur ro //

original: sgrub pa'i yan lag mi brjod pa'i rgol ba thams cad ces bya ba de dang mtshungs pa'i phyir don med par sna ba thams cad tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i yan lag mi brjod pa'i rgol ba thams cad ces bya ba de dang mtshungs pa'i phyir don med par sna ba thams cad tshar bcad pa'i gnas yin no //
translated: All the disputations that do not state the branches of proof are pointless, because they are similar to that.

original: yi ge'i go rims bstan pa thams cad du don med pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: yi ge'i go rims bstan pa thams cad du don med pa nyid ma yin /

analyzed: rnam pa 'ga' zhig la yang don dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir 'di nyid kyi don med pa'i ngang tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no //

analyzed: gzhan yang yi ge'i go rims bstan pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no //

analyzed: yi ge zhes bya ba 'di shin tu myur bar rjod par byed de /

original: mkhur tshos la rdeg pa dang / mchan khung 'tshir ba zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa dag kyang brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mkhur tshos la rdeg pa dang / mchan khung 'tshir ba zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa dag kyang brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: tshogs dang phyir rgol ba dag la lan gsum brjod kyang /

analyzed: tshogs dang phyir rgol ba la lan gsum brjod na /

original: rtogs pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: rtogs pa ma yin pa /

original: shin tu myur du brjod pa zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i rgyus ngag sbyor ba gang yin pa de'i don mi shes pa'i phyir nus pa med pa sgrub pa'i phyir /

analyzed: rab tu sbyor ba ni tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba 'di la /

analyzed: 'di ni don med pa nyid las tha dad pa med de gang gi tshe de'i rnal ma dang 'brel pa'i go bar byed pa nyid smra bar 'gyur gyi /

original: 'di la nus pa med pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la nus pa med pa ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not that this is incapable.

original: de la tshogs ba la sogs pa blun po dag gis khong du chud pa med pa'i byir mkhas pa tshar gcad pa'i 'os ma yin no //
analyzed: de la tshogs ba la sogs pa blun po dag gis khong du chud pa med pa'i byir mkhas pa tshar gcad pa'i 'os ma yin no //

analyzed: gal te tshogs pa'i shes rab yongs su chod pa med par smra ba'i phyir tshar gcad par bya ba nyid @346a * //

analyzed: yin no zhe na / rgol bas rigs pa bstan pas blun po mi shes pa la ci'i phyir /

original: 'brel ba med par don brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'brel ba med par don brjod pa ni /

analyzed: don med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /

analyzed: snga phyi 'brel pa med pa'i phyir 'brel pa med pa ni don dang bral ba yin te /

analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i don nyid du gzung bar bya ste /

analyzed: de ni tshogs pa'i don dang bral ba'i phyir don dang 'brel ba ste /

analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pa'i khyad par la brten pa'i phyir / logs shig tu tshar gcad pa'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid du bstan na /

analyzed: gang de ni ci yang ma yin no //

analyzed: gal te de ni ma yin te /

analyzed: de lta bus kyang grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /

translated: from the word ‚Äúox,‚Äù
