translated: The word ‚Äúteaches‚Äù is explained as the meaning of ‚Äúthat which is to be taught.‚Äù

original: go ni'i sgra las kyang 'jig rten pa khong du chud pa mthong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: go ni'i sgra las kyang 'jig rten pa khong du chud pa mthong ba ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the word ‚Äúteaches‚Äù also seen to have the meaning of ‚Äúunderstood by the world‚Äù?

original: mthong ba bden te /
analyzed: mthong ba bden te /
translated: It is seen, but not in the primary sense.

original: dngos su ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos su ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the primary meaning.

original: de bstan du zin kyang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bstan du zin kyang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Even if it were taught, it would not be reasonable.

original: bud med dang dmangs rigs dag la gnyi ga rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bud med dang dmangs rigs dag la gnyi ga rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because neither women nor ≈õ≈´dras understand both.

original: sgra dang zur chag gnyi ga gang yin pa de nyid ni shes par 'gyur na /üîΩna ka'i sgra dang / mu ka'i sgra rig pas ni /
analyzed: sgra dang zur chag gnyi ga gang yin pa de nyid ni shes par 'gyur na / na ka'i sgra dang / mu ka'i sgra rig pas ni /
translated: If it is understood that the word ‚Äúteaches‚Äù is the same as the word ‚Äúunderstood,‚Äù

original: sna'i sgrar shes pa ma yin pa gang yin pa des /
analyzed: sna'i sgrar shes pa ma yin pa gang yin pa des /
translated: then the word ‚Äúteaches‚Äù is not understood as the word ‚Äúteaches‚ÄùüîΩby the word ‚Äúteaches.‚Äù

original: ji ltar na sgra zur chag pa las sgra khong du chud cing de las don khong du chud par 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar na sgra zur chag pa las sgra khong du chud cing de las don khong du chud par 'gyur /
translated: Then how could the word ‚Äúteaches‚Äù be understood from the corrupt word ‚Äúteaches,‚Äù and from that the meaning be understood?

original: gnyi ga rig pa ma yin pas kyang rtogs pa mthong ba'i brgyud pas rtogs pa yang ma yin pa dang / don la nus pa med pa sgra yang rtogs pa bskyed pa nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga rig pa ma yin pas kyang rtogs pa mthong ba'i brgyud pas rtogs pa yang ma yin pa dang / don la nus pa med pa sgra yang rtogs pa bskyed pa nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the object is not a producer of the understanding, because the sound is not capable of producing the understanding.

original: don yang rjod par byed pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: don yang rjod par byed pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan nyid ma yin te /
translated: And the object is not a different thing called ‚Äúthe expresser,‚Äù

original: gzhan de'i yul khong du chud pa skyed par byed pa las so //
analyzed: gzhan de'i yul khong du chud pa skyed par byed pa las so //
translated: because it is the producer of the understanding of the other, the object.

original: gal te sgra zur chag gis sgra khong du chud pa bskyed par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te sgra zur chag gis sgra khong du chud pa bskyed par 'gyur na /
translated: If a sound in an unknown language were to produce the understanding of a sound,

original: ci'i phyir don skyed par mi byed /
analyzed: ci'i phyir don skyed par mi byed /
translated: why would it not produce the understanding of the object?

original: 'di don las 'jigs pa cung zad ma mthong na gang gis de yongs su 'dor bar byed /
analyzed: 'di don las 'jigs pa cung zad ma mthong na gang gis de yongs su 'dor bar byed /
translated: If one sees no danger in the object, why would one avoid it?

original: brdar ma byas pa'i sgra yang rtogs pa bskyed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brdar ma byas pa'i sgra yang rtogs pa bskyed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: A sound that has not been used in a convention is not a producer of an understanding.

original: sgra zur chag gis sgra 'di la yang rang bzhin gyis rtogs pa skyed par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra zur chag gis sgra 'di la yang rang bzhin gyis rtogs pa skyed par byed pa yin te /
translated: A sound in an unknown language is not a natural producer of an understanding,

original: mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not seen to be such.

original: brdar byas pa nyid yod na yang bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brdar byas pa nyid yod na yang bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the convention itself exists, it is produced.

original: brda'i dbang gis 'jug pa yin na ci'i @347a * //
analyzed: brda'i dbang gis 'jug pa yin na ci'i @347a * //
translated: If the convention is applied by the power of convention, why

original: phyir don nyid la 'jug par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: phyir don nyid la 'jug par mi 'gyur /
translated: does it not apply to the object itself?

original: de ltar na rtog pa po'i brgyud pas dub pa yongs su spangs pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na rtog pa po'i brgyud pas dub pa yongs su spangs pa yin te /
translated: In this way, the fault of the endless regress of the one who conceives is

original: bzlog pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzlog pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: abandoned, because the opposite is seen.

original: sgra dag gis don bstan pa med pa la /
analyzed: sgra dag gis don bstan pa med pa la /
translated: If the meaning is not indicated by the words,üîΩthen it is seen that the many people in the world understand by means of

original: sgra zur chag nyid kyis 'jig rten mang pos rtogs par gyur pa mthong ba'i phyir sgra rjes su 'chad pa don med pa yin no //üîΩgal te don med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra zur chag nyid kyis 'jig rten mang pos rtogs par gyur pa mthong ba'i phyir sgra rjes su 'chad pa don med pa yin no // gal te don med pa ma yin te /
translated: the broken words. Therefore it is pointless to explain the words.üîΩIf you say that it is not pointless, because the purpose is to establish the

original: sgra legs par sbyor ba sgrub pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: sgra legs par sbyor ba sgrub pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: correct use of words,

original: sgra'i legs par sbyar ba 'di gang yin /
analyzed: sgra'i legs par sbyar ba 'di gang yin /
translated: what is the correct use of words?

original: de dag la shes rab dang / mang du thos pa la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba ni ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: de dag la shes rab dang / mang du thos pa la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba ni ma mthong ngo //
translated: We do not see that the correct use of words is wisdom, learning, and so on.

original: de dag la yang gcig tu thos pa la sogs pa med cing ston par bya ba khyad par 'ga' zhig med pa dang / chos sgrub par byed pa nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag la yang gcig tu thos pa la sogs pa med cing ston par bya ba khyad par 'ga' zhig med pa dang / chos sgrub par byed pa nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, they do not have a single hearing, etc. , and they do not have any special thing to be taught, and they do not practice the Dharma.

original: log par 'jug pa'i bskul ba rnams /
analyzed: log par 'jug pa'i bskul ba rnams /
translated: The urging of those who engage in error

original: legs par sbyar ba yin pa dag las chos ma yin pa skye ba'i phyir gzhan las kyang bzlog pa'i chos skye bas /
analyzed: legs par sbyar ba yin pa dag las chos ma yin pa skye ba'i phyir gzhan las kyang bzlog pa'i chos skye bas /
translated: is not the Dharma, because non-Dharma arises from them, and because Dharma arises from others.

original: sgra'i sbyor ba kho na mtho ris sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i sbyor ba kho na mtho ris sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The application of words is not the means of achieving heaven,

original: de nyid tshig tu brjod pa tsam nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid tshig tu brjod pa tsam nyid do //
translated: because it is merely the expression of those words.

original: rigs pa shes pa ni /
analyzed: rigs pa shes pa ni /
translated: One who knows the reasoning

original: de lta bu'i rnam pa'i lus la gus par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pa'i lus la gus par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: will not respect such a body,

original: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i chos sgrub par byed pa bsgral bas stong pa sgra 'ba' zhig rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i chos sgrub par byed pa bsgral bas stong pa sgra 'ba' zhig rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir /
translated: because it is empty of the practice of the Dharma such as generosity, and because it is merely the application of words.

original: dmyal bar ltung ngo zhes bya ba smra ba 'ga' zhig kha yon por mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir legs par sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i sgra ni cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: dmyal bar ltung ngo zhes bya ba smra ba 'ga' zhig kha yon por mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir legs par sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i sgra ni cung zad kyang med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no such thing as a ‚Äúwell-formed‚Äù sound.

original: gal te khyad par can gyi sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir legs par sbyar ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par can gyi sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir legs par sbyar ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that a sound is well-formed because it is formed in a particular way,

original: khyad par can gang yin /üîΩgang rig par bya ba /
analyzed: khyad par can gang yin / gang rig par bya ba /
translated: what is the particular way?

original: rig pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is the way in which the object of knowledge is formed.üîΩIt is formed in the way in which the object of knowledge is formed, and it is endowed with the qualities of being an object of knowledge and so on.

original: gang yang de dag yon tan rab kyi mthar thug pa la ltos pa med pa brdzun la zhen pa gang yin pa de /
analyzed: gang yang de dag yon tan rab kyi mthar thug pa la ltos pa med pa brdzun la zhen pa gang yin pa de /
translated: Some people are attached to falsehoods, and they do not care about the highest quality.

original: de lta bu nyid kyis sbyor bar byed kyi gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid kyis sbyor bar byed kyi gzhan ma yin no //
translated: They form sounds in that way, not in any other way.

original: 'dir dad par bya ba 'ga' zhig gi ngag la dbang po med na /
analyzed: 'dir dad par bya ba 'ga' zhig gi ngag la dbang po med na /
translated: If you have no faculty for discerning what is to be believed,

original: gang las 'di de lta bu'i nges pa bya /
analyzed: gang las 'di de lta bu'i nges pa bya /
translated: how can you be certain about this?

original: khyad par can rab tu sbyor bar byed ces bya ba de lta bu nged cag gis yon tan gyi khyad par mthong bar /
analyzed: khyad par can rab tu sbyor bar byed ces bya ba de lta bu nged cag gis yon tan gyi khyad par mthong bar /
translated: We see a particular quality in the sounds that are formed in a particular way.

original: legs par sbyor ba'i sgra zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig la yang gus par mi byed pa de bas na de'i rjes su bshad par rigs pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: legs par sbyor ba'i sgra zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig la yang gus par mi byed pa de bas na de'i rjes su bshad par rigs pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: The term well-formed is not respected by some. Therefore, it is not right to explain it in that way.

original: yon tan khyad par du byed pa @347b nyid med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrig byed bsrung ba la sogs pa yang dogs pa med pa nyid de /üîΩde'i brdar byas pa gnas pa ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: yon tan khyad par du byed pa @347b nyid med pa'i phyir ro // rig byed bsrung ba la sogs pa yang dogs pa med pa nyid de / de'i brdar byas pa gnas pa ma yin pa la'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not right to explain it in that way, because it does not have the special quality of being well-formed.

original: yon tan gyi khyad par yod du zin kyang de lta bu'i rjes su bshad pa'i rtsol pa mi bya ste /
analyzed: yon tan gyi khyad par yod du zin kyang de lta bu'i rjes su bshad pa'i rtsol pa mi bya ste /
translated: Even if it did have the special quality, one should not make the effort to explain it in that way,

original: de'i rang bzhin gzhan las kyang grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gzhan las kyang grub pa'i phyir /
translated: because its nature is established from other sources.

original: tha mal pa dang / zur chag pa dang / 'gro lding ba dang / aa 'dra'i skad bzhin no //
analyzed: tha mal pa dang / zur chag pa dang / 'gro lding ba dang / aa 'dra'i skad bzhin no //
translated: It is like the languages of ordinary people, the degenerate, the Dravidians, and the AhƒÅlya.

original: yul so so'i skad dag ni /
analyzed: yul so so'i skad dag ni /
translated: The languages of individual countries

original: mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin te /
translated: do not have characteristics.

original: 'on kyang brgyud pa'i tshig gi dbang gis de dag 'jig rten pas de bzhin du shes shing de'i sbyor ba dang nyams pa yang shes pa de bzhin du legs par sbyar ba'i sgra yang shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang brgyud pa'i tshig gi dbang gis de dag 'jig rten pas de bzhin du shes shing de'i sbyor ba dang nyams pa yang shes pa de bzhin du legs par sbyar ba'i sgra yang shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: But, by the power of the words of the tradition, the worldly people know them in that way, and they know their application and their deterioration. In the same way, they will know the words of the good composition.

original: sgra'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa gang yin pa de nyid ni rmongs pa'i 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa gang yin pa de nyid ni rmongs pa'i 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The engagement in the characteristics of words is the same as the engagement in confusion.

original: yan lag go bzlog pa la yang gang gi tshe /
analyzed: yan lag go bzlog pa la yang gang gi tshe /
translated: When the members are reversed,

original: tshig dag gi 'brel pa shes na ni bzlog pa ma yin la /
analyzed: tshig dag gi 'brel pa shes na ni bzlog pa ma yin la /
translated: if one knows the connection of the words, it is not reversed.

original: don rtogs pa'i nus pa med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: don rtogs pa'i nus pa med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not that there is no ability to understand the meaning.

original: 'di'i nges pa cung zad kyang med cing /
analyzed: 'di'i nges pa cung zad kyang med cing /
translated: There is no certainty at all in this.

original: shes par byed pa'i khyad par yang de lta bu nyid kyi yan lag rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: shes par byed pa'i khyad par yang de lta bu nyid kyi yan lag rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: And the special means of knowing should be applied in just that way.

original: de dag gi rim pa nyid ji ltar gnas pa dag las don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag gi rim pa nyid ji ltar gnas pa dag las don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning will be understood from just those members that are in the right order.

original: bzlog pa las ni rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bzlog pa las ni rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not understood from the reversed order.

original: de las go rims rtogs pa khong du chud pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de las go rims rtogs pa khong du chud pa yin no zhe na /
translated: From that, the understanding of the order is comprehended.

original: 'brel pa shes pa med pa las kyang go rims rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'brel pa shes pa med pa las kyang go rims rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: And one cannot understand the order of the words without knowing the relation between them.

original: sgra de dag gi 'brel pa yin no zhes bya bar shes pa med pa de dag go rims gang gis snga ma dang phyi ma gang dang gang rnam par 'jog par 'gyur /
analyzed: sgra de dag gi 'brel pa yin no zhes bya bar shes pa med pa de dag go rims gang gis snga ma dang phyi ma gang dang gang rnam par 'jog par 'gyur /
translated: If one does not know that the words are related, by what order would one establish the former and latter words?

original: 'brel pa rtogs na de dag gi 'brel pa nyid ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du 'brel pa rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'brel pa rtogs na de dag gi 'brel pa nyid ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du 'brel pa rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If one understands the relation, one understands the relation of those words as it is.

original: ngag la ni tshig gi go rims kyi nges pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /üîΩdper na rgyal po'i skyes bu'i 'am /
analyzed: ngag la ni tshig gi go rims kyi nges pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te / dper na rgyal po'i skyes bu'i 'am /
translated: But there is no fixed order of the words in a sentence.

original: skyes bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: skyes bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the expression ‚Äúking‚Äôs man‚Äù or ‚Äúman of the king.‚Äù

original: ji srid du tshig gi sa bon yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i bar der ni ngag gcig yin te /
analyzed: ji srid du tshig gi sa bon yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i bar der ni ngag gcig yin te /
translated: As long as the seed of the words is not complete, it is one sentence.

original: dper na lha sbyin pa nag mo khyer te shog ces bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na lha sbyin pa nag mo khyer te shog ces bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the expression ‚ÄúBring Devadatta‚Äôs black cow.‚Äù

original: 'dir tshig dag gi go rims ji lta ba bzhin sbyor ba med na yang /
analyzed: 'dir tshig dag gi go rims ji lta ba bzhin sbyor ba med na yang /
translated: Here, even though there is no order of the words,

original: don rtogs pa khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don rtogs pa khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference in the realization of the meaning.

original: go rims kyi mngon par zhen pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: go rims kyi mngon par zhen pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is not even the slightest adherence to order,

original: dam bca' ba'i tshig med par yang don ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //üîΩrtogs par @348a * //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i tshig med par yang don ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to // rtogs par @348a * //
translated: because the meaning is understood just as it is, even without the words of the thesis.

original: bya ba'i don gyi sgra yang rab tu sbyor na shin tu thal bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: bya ba'i don gyi sgra yang rab tu sbyor na shin tu thal bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: If one applies the words of the meaning to be understood, there is an extreme consequence.

original: lhag ma dag gi yang 'brel ba nye bar bstan nas /
analyzed: lhag ma dag gi yang 'brel ba nye bar bstan nas /
translated: And if one teaches the connection of the remaining words,

original: chos can la yod pa nyid bstan par bya ba zhes bya ba'i nges pa cung zad kyang med de /
analyzed: chos can la yod pa nyid bstan par bya ba zhes bya ba'i nges pa cung zad kyang med de /
translated: there is no rule that the existence of the subject must be taught.

original: gnyi ga ltar yang rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
translated: It is taught that understanding arises in both ways.

original: tshig gi 'brel pa shes pa med pa la yang /
analyzed: tshig gi 'brel pa shes pa med pa la yang /
translated: Even without knowing the connection of the words,

original: de dag las go rims shes par mi 'gyur bas /
analyzed: de dag las go rims shes par mi 'gyur bas /
translated: the order is not known from them.

original: 'di'i don med pa las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di'i don med pa las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since there is no difference in the meaning of this,

original: dus la ma bab pa logs shig mi brjod do //
analyzed: dus la ma bab pa logs shig mi brjod do //
translated: what is untimely is not mentioned separately.

original: yan lag gang yang rung ba med na ma tshang pa yin te /
analyzed: yan lag gang yang rung ba med na ma tshang pa yin te /
translated: If any one of the members is missing, it is incomplete.

original: ngag gang la dam bca' ba la sogs pa rnams kyi yan lag gcig med na ngag de ni ma tshang ba yin te /
analyzed: ngag gang la dam bca' ba la sogs pa rnams kyi yan lag gcig med na ngag de ni ma tshang ba yin te /
translated: If any one of the members of a statement‚Äîthe thesis, etc.‚Äîis missing, that statement is incomplete.

original: sgrub par byed pa med na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa med na /
translated: If there is no proof,

original: bsgrub par bya ba mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the probandum is not established.

original: dam bca' bde na ma tshang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dam bca' bde na ma tshang ba ma yin te /
translated: If there is no thesis, it is not incomplete,

original: de med na yang rtogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan to //
analyzed: de med na yang rtogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan to //
translated: because even if it is absent, there is understanding.

original: gzhan na re med pa de nyid mtshan nyid yin na yang tshar gcad par bya ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan na re med pa de nyid mtshan nyid yin na yang tshar gcad par bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If someone says that even if the absence of a proof is a reason for defeat,üîΩthen a statement that does not have a proof

original: rtogs par bya ba'i don gyi sgrub par byed pa la /üîΩsgra med par sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni tshar bcad par 'os par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba'i don gyi sgrub par byed pa la / sgra med par sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni tshar bcad par 'os par 'gyur ro //
translated: is a reason for defeat in the proof of the object to be understood.

original: don dang ldan par brjod pa dag ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dang ldan par brjod pa dag ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But that is not so, because it is not a statement that expresses a meaning.

original: yang dag par ma dpyad par rjod par byed pa de nyid ni /
analyzed: yang dag par ma dpyad par rjod par byed pa de nyid ni /
translated: The statement that does not analyze

original: dam bca' ba sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' ba sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin no //
translated: is not a member that proves the thesis.

original: gtan tshigs dang dpe lhag pa ni lhag pa ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang dpe lhag pa ni lhag pa ste /
translated: The reason and example are redundant.üîΩ

original: byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba gcig las /
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba gcig las /
translated: The reason and example are redundant when one of them is stated.üîΩFor example, ‚Äúbecause it is produced‚Äù is redundant when ‚Äúbecause it is impermanent‚Äù is stated.

original: cig shos ni don med pa yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: cig shos ni don med pa yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: The other is meaningless.

original: nges pa khas blangs pa yod na de dang de yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nges pa khas blangs pa yod na de dang de yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: If you accept that, then you should understand that it is so in this case.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i ngag gcig sbyor ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi rnam par dpyod pa gang yin pa la don med pa yin no zhes bya bar tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin gyi /üîΩgtam rgyud sna tshogs pa dag la ni skyon cung zad kyang med de /

translated: It is a basis for refutation to apply one syllogism in an argument that precedes an analysis.

original: nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrjes su smra ba las gzhan /üîΩsgra dang don yang yang smra ba ni /üîΩyang brjod pa ste /
analyzed: nges pa med pa'i phyir ro // rjes su smra ba las gzhan / sgra dang don yang yang smra ba ni / yang brjod pa ste /
translated: But there is not the slightest fault in various stories because they are not definite.üîΩThe repetition of words and meaningsüîΩis the repetition of words and meanings.

original: sgra yang brjod pa ni /
analyzed: sgra yang brjod pa ni /
translated: The repetition of words is

original: sgra mi rtag sgra mi rtag ces bya ba lta bu dang / don yang yang brjod pa ni sgra mi rtag / sgra 'gog pa'i chos can yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag sgra mi rtag ces bya ba lta bu dang / don yang yang brjod pa ni sgra mi rtag / sgra 'gog pa'i chos can yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, sound is impermanent, sound is impermanent, and the meaning is stated again and again, sound is impermanent, sound is a dharma that ceases.

original: 'dir sgra yang yang brjod pa logs shig mi bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir sgra yang yang brjod pa logs shig mi bya ste /
translated: Here, sound should not be stated separately again and again,

original: don yang yang brjod pa'i tshig @348b nyid las rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don yang yang brjod pa'i tshig @348b nyid las rtogs pa'i phyir ro //

original: don tha dad la sgra mtshungs pa la skyon cung zad kyang med de /
analyzed: don tha dad la sgra mtshungs pa la skyon cung zad kyang med de /
translated: There is not the slightest fault in having the same sound for different meanings.üîΩFor example,

original: dpen na / bdag po rgod par gyur na drag por rgod 'gyur du ni shin tu 'gyur //
analyzed: dpen na / bdag po rgod par gyur na drag por rgod 'gyur du ni shin tu 'gyur //
translated: If the master becomes agitated, he becomes extremely agitated.

original: chas su zhugs shing rdul gyis skyug ldan rgyug na rab tu rgyug par 'gyur //
analyzed: chas su zhugs shing rdul gyis skyug ldan rgyug na rab tu rgyug par 'gyur //

original: yon tan ldan zhing skyon bral can la gnod na rab tu smod par 'gyur //
analyzed: yon tan ldan zhing skyon bral can la gnod na rab tu smod par 'gyur //
translated: If he harms one who has good qualities and is free from faults, he strongly reproaches.

original: 'khrul 'khor nor nyung ba yis nyos nas gar byed na ni gar byed 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba lta bu'am /
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor nor nyung ba yis nyos nas gar byed na ni gar byed 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba lta bu'am /
translated: If he buys a machine with little money and dances, he dances.

original: gang gang la yod na yod par 'gyur zhing med na med par 'gyur ba de ni de'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: gang gang la yod na yod par 'gyur zhing med na med par 'gyur ba de ni de'i rgyu yin la /
translated: If something exists when it exists and does not exist when it does not exist, it is the cause of that.

original: cig shos ni 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: cig shos ni 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: The other is the effect.

original: rtogs pa'i don yang bzlas pa ni yang bzlas pa ste /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i don yang bzlas pa ni yang bzlas pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the word ‚Äúagain‚Äù is repetition.

original: dper na dam bca' pa'i tshig lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na dam bca' pa'i tshig lta bu'o //

analyzed: don yang brjod pa nyid kyis khong du chud pa nyid kyi phyir logs shig brjod pa mi bya'o //

analyzed: 'dir yang nges bsgrub par byed pa'i ngag gi skyon du brjod par bya'o /

analyzed: gtam rgyud rgyas pa ni ma yin te /

analyzed: ma yin te yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhe na / 'di ni bla ma yang ma yin /

analyzed: slob ma yang ma yin pas na /

original: logs shig tu mi brjod do //
analyzed: logs shig tu mi brjod do //

analyzed: yang zlos pa la yang rtogs pa'i don gyi tshig lhag pa nyid yin no //

analyzed: 'dod pa'i nyan pa po la /

analyzed: yang zlos pa dag ni skyon mtshungs pa'i phyir 'dus pa nyid du rigs pa yin te /

analyzed: skyon med pa'i phyir dang / tha dad pa la yang yon tan med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: ci yang 'di yang gi tshig yin no zhes mjug bsdu ba'i rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: The statement that the words are repeated because the meaning is repeated is not correct,

original: tshogs pa lan gsum brjod pa shes shing lan brjod pa de med pa de ni rjes su smra ba med pa yin te /
analyzed: tshogs pa lan gsum brjod pa shes shing lan brjod pa de med pa de ni rjes su smra ba med pa yin te /
translated: When one knows the opponent's statement of the case and the opponent's reply, but does not state the reply, that is called no reply.

original: tshogs pas rgol ba lan gsum brjod ba'i ngag gi don shes bzhin du phyir rgol bas lan brjod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rjes su smra ba med pa zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: tshogs pas rgol ba lan gsum brjod ba'i ngag gi don shes bzhin du phyir rgol bas lan brjod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rjes su smra ba med pa zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no //
translated: When one knows the meaning of the opponent's statement of the case and reply, but does not state the reply, that is called no reply, which is a ground for defeat.

original: lan brjod pa med par ci la brten nas gzhan gyi phyogs dgag pa smra bar byed /
analyzed: lan brjod pa med par ci la brten nas gzhan gyi phyogs dgag pa smra bar byed /
translated: How can one refute the opponent's position without stating a reply?

original: gal te lan gyi sgo nas nges pa'i phyir 'di ni tshar gcad pa'i gnas ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te lan gyi sgo nas nges pa'i phyir 'di ni tshar gcad pa'i gnas ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is not a ground for defeat because the opponent is certain by means of the reply, then it is not a ground for defeat.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur na /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur na /
translated: If that were so, then

original: lan gyi sgo nas yon tan dang skyon dang ldan pa rmongs pa ma yin pa nyid du shes pa'i phyir brjod pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: lan gyi sgo nas yon tan dang skyon dang ldan pa rmongs pa ma yin pa nyid du shes pa'i phyir brjod pas ci zhig bya /
translated: what is the use of stating the reply, since one knows the opponent's position has good qualities or faults and is not confused?

original: ma yin te lam gyi yul mi shes pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ma yin te lam gyi yul mi shes pa'i phyir te /
translated: No, because one does not know the object of the reply.

original: gal te 'di lan rjod par mi byed na lan gyi yul med pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te 'di lan rjod par mi byed na lan gyi yul med pa yin la /
translated: If one does not state the reply, there is no object of the reply.

original: 'on te lan brjod na ji ltar lan rjod par mi byed /
analyzed: 'on te lan brjod na ji ltar lan rjod par mi byed /
translated: But if you do respond, how can you not respond?

original: brjod pa med pa la yang lan brjod pa de dang / 'di ni 'gal bar smra ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: brjod pa med pa la yang lan brjod pa de dang / 'di ni 'gal bar smra ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you do not respond, you are contradicting yourself.

original: @349b 'ga' zhig la lan gyi nus pa yod na yang lan brjod pa med na /
analyzed: @349b 'ga' zhig la lan gyi nus pa yod na yang lan brjod pa med na /
translated: If someone has the ability to respond, but does not respond,

original: de de srid du tshar gcad pa'i 'os pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de de srid du tshar gcad pa'i 'os pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then for as long as he does not respond, he is not fit to be defeated.

original: dam bcas pa med pa'i phyir /üîΩ'di yang dang por thams cad brjod par bya zhing /
analyzed: dam bcas pa med pa'i phyir / 'di yang dang por thams cad brjod par bya zhing /
translated: Because he has no thesis.üîΩHe has not stated that ‚Äúfirst I will state everything,

original: phyis lan brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dam bcas pa ni de med do //
analyzed: phyis lan brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dam bcas pa ni de med do //
translated: and later I will respond.‚Äù

original: 'on kyang ji lta ji ltar yang rung lan brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang ji lta ji ltar yang rung lan brjod par bya'o //
translated: But in any case, he should respond.

original: lan yang rten med par rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lan yang rten med par rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And it is not logical for a response to be without a basis.

original: lan ma brjod pa zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas su rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: lan ma brjod pa zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas su rigs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is logical that the one who does not respond is fit to be defeated.

original: gal te rgol ba rang gi sgrub pa don gyi rten bshad pa na zol gyi zhar la 'ongs pa gzhan dang gzhan smra bar 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: gal te rgol ba rang gi sgrub pa don gyi rten bshad pa na zol gyi zhar la 'ongs pa gzhan dang gzhan smra bar 'gyur ba ni /
translated: If the challenger explains the basis of his own proof, he may speak of other irrelevant matters.

original: rtsod pa'i rten shes par 'dod pa'i don tsam brjod nas dam bca' ba la sogs pa don gyi khyad par brgyud cing gzhan don med pa khas blangs nas brjod pa rgyas par byed /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i rten shes par 'dod pa'i don tsam brjod nas dam bca' ba la sogs pa don gyi khyad par brgyud cing gzhan don med pa khas blangs nas brjod pa rgyas par byed /
translated: Having stated the mere meaning of the basis of debate, having accepted the thesis and so on, one elaborates on the meaning of the words.

original: gang gi tshe de yang phyir rgol bas thams cad zlos mi nus pa de'i rtsod pa'i rten gyi don tsam la lan gyi tshig gi nus pa la gnod pa ci yod /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de yang phyir rgol bas thams cad zlos mi nus pa de'i rtsod pa'i rten gyi don tsam la lan gyi tshig gi nus pa la gnod pa ci yod /
translated: When the opponent is unable to repeat all of that, what is the harm in responding with the mere meaning of the basis of the debate?

original: gang gis na rgol ba'i tshig la rjes su smra ba med pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes brjod /
analyzed: gang gis na rgol ba'i tshig la rjes su smra ba med pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes brjod /
translated: Why is it said that the absence of a response to the opponent‚Äôs words is a ground for defeat?

original: de'i phyir rgol ba'i tshig thams cad kyi rjes su smra ba med pa lan la nus pa med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgol ba'i tshig thams cad kyi rjes su smra ba med pa lan la nus pa med pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore the absence of a response to all of the opponent‚Äôs words is not a failure to respond.

original: gang gi tshig med na mi 'gyur bas shes par 'dod pa'i don grub pa ste de nyid dper na phyogs kyi chos nyid dang khyad pa rab tu sgrub pa tsam ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshig med na mi 'gyur bas shes par 'dod pa'i don grub pa ste de nyid dper na phyogs kyi chos nyid dang khyad pa rab tu sgrub pa tsam ste /
translated: When one‚Äôs words are not present, the meaning one wishes to convey is established, that is, it is proven by merely establishing the property of the position and the entailment.

original: phyogs kyi chos nyid kyi brjod pa ni gtan tshigs ma grub pa bsrung ba'i phyir dang khyab pa rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i tshig ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la rjes su 'gro ba smra bar bya ba nyid
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nyid kyi brjod pa ni gtan tshigs ma grub pa bsrung ba'i phyir dang khyab pa rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i tshig ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la rjes su 'gro ba smra bar bya ba nyid
translated: The positive concomitance is what is to be stated.

original: yin no // de la yang zhar las byung ba gzhan bstan par mi bya zhing de gdon mi za bar sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yul yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yin no // de la yang zhar las byung ba gzhan bstan par mi bya zhing de gdon mi za bar sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yul yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, one should not teach other digressions, and that is definitely the object of the proof.

original: sun 'byin pas nye bar bstan par bya ba nyid yin zhing /
analyzed: sun 'byin pas nye bar bstan par bya ba nyid yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, it is what is to be taught by the refutation.

original: de la yang thams cad gong du go rims bzhin dang / phyis su na 'byin pa'i tshig brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de la yang thams cad gong du go rims bzhin dang / phyis su na 'byin pa'i tshig brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: Moreover, all of that should be stated in order, and later the statement of the refutation should not be stated,

original: lan gnyis brjod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lan gnyis brjod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that it would be stated twice.

original: sun 'byin pa'i yul nye bar bstan pa'i don du rjes su smra ba la rgol ba'i tshig gis go rims bzhin du brjod pa ni don med pa yin te /
analyzed: sun 'byin pa'i yul nye bar bstan pa'i don du rjes su smra ba la rgol ba'i tshig gis go rims bzhin du brjod pa ni don med pa yin te /
translated: In order to demonstrate the object of refutation, the respondent states the opponent‚Äôs words in order, but this is pointless.

original: dgos pa med pa nyid yin no //üîΩsun 'byin par byed pa'i yang 'di @350a * //
analyzed: dgos pa med pa nyid yin no // sun 'byin par byed pa'i yang 'di @350a * //
translated: It is useless.

original: skyon yin no zhes bya ba /
analyzed: skyon yin no zhes bya ba /
translated: The respondent‚Äôs fault is this:üîΩ‚ÄúIf you say that is a fault,

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then it is a fault because it is not the case that without it, there would be no refutation.‚Äù

original: skyon gyi tshig re re'i yul bstan par bya bar nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: skyon gyi tshig re re'i yul bstan par bya bar nyid yin gyi /
translated: The object of each of the respondent‚Äôs words of refutation should be demonstrated.

original: yul thams cad bstan par byas nas /
analyzed: yul thams cad bstan par byas nas /
translated: Having demonstrated all the objects,

original: cig car skyon brjod par nus pa ma yin te //
analyzed: cig car skyon brjod par nus pa ma yin te //
translated: he is not able to state the faults all at once,

original: don so so'i skye ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don so so'i skye ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the individual meanings are different.

original: de'i phyir don sun 'byin par byed pa gang yin pa de nyid sun 'byin par byed pa'i yul yin pas de'i tshe /
analyzed: de'i phyir don sun 'byin par byed pa gang yin pa de nyid sun 'byin par byed pa'i yul yin pas de'i tshe /
translated: Therefore, the object of the respondent‚Äôs refutation is just that which is to be refuted, and at that time,

original: bstan par bya ba yin gyi gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: bstan par bya ba yin gyi gzhan ma yin te /
translated: it is to be demonstrated, not something else,

original: de sun 'byin pa na gzhan bstan pa ni 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de sun 'byin pa na gzhan bstan pa ni 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because when that is refuted, it is not related to the demonstration of something else.

original: de ltar sun 'byin pa de la yang don gzhan gyi skyon //
analyzed: de ltar sun 'byin pa de la yang don gzhan gyi skyon //
translated: This refutation also has the fault of being irrelevant,

original: gzhan gyi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is about something else.

original: rjes su smra ba dang / sun 'byin pa 'di nyid ni rigs pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su smra ba dang / sun 'byin pa 'di nyid ni rigs pa'o //
translated: This is the logic of the response and the refutation.

original: thams cad cig car rjes su smra bar byed pa na yang skyon brjod pa'i dus su yul bstan par bya pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: thams cad cig car rjes su smra bar byed pa na yang skyon brjod pa'i dus su yul bstan par bya pa nyid yin te /
translated: Even if one responds to everything all at once, when it is time to state the faults, one must indicate the object,

original: yul ma bstan pa'i skyon ni brjod par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yul ma bstan pa'i skyon ni brjod par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible to state the faults without indicating the object.

original: de ltar na yang rjes su smra ba lan gnyis byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na yang rjes su smra ba lan gnyis byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the response would be made twice.

original: de la thog mar thams cad go rims bzhin du smra pa ni dgos pa med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de la thog mar thams cad go rims bzhin du smra pa ni dgos pa med pa nyid yin no //
translated: In that case, it would be pointless to state everything in order at the beginning.

original: sun 'byin par byed pa'i rgol bas sun 'byin pa brjod par bya ba gang de la rigs pa ma yin pa de rjod par byed pa yin te skyon brjod pa med par lan gnyis brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sun 'byin par byed pa'i rgol bas sun 'byin pa brjod par bya ba gang de la rigs pa ma yin pa de rjod par byed pa yin te skyon brjod pa med par lan gnyis brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: The respondent who makes a refutation that is illogical when stating the refutation is stating the faults without stating the object, because he states the response twice without stating the object.

original: cig car thams cad rjes su smra ba ni /
analyzed: cig car thams cad rjes su smra ba ni /
translated: The response that responds to everything all at onceüîΩis illogical.

original: pham pa'i rten can du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: pham pa'i rten can du brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be called a basis for defeat.

original: gal te de ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is so, then it is so.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur na don gzhan tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba de bstan zin to //
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur na don gzhan tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba de bstan zin to //
translated: It has been shown that the meaning of ‚Äúthe basis for defeat‚Äù is a different meaning.

original: de la zhar la 'ongs pa 'ga' zhig la rgol bas /
analyzed: de la zhar la 'ongs pa 'ga' zhig la rgol bas /
translated: In that regard, someone who is debating a certain point that has arisen

original: sgrub par byed pa med na mi 'byung ba ma yin pa brjod pa ni /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa med na mi 'byung ba ma yin pa brjod pa ni /
translated: says, ‚ÄúIf there is no proof, it is not produced.‚Äù

original: don gzhan go bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir tshar gcad par 'os pa yin gyi /
analyzed: don gzhan go bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir tshar gcad par 'os pa yin gyi /
translated: Because it is not an understanding of a different meaning, it is worthy of defeat.

original: 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig tu zhar la 'ongs pa byed pa med pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig tu zhar la 'ongs pa byed pa med pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that something is a point that has arisen in some cases.

original: des de'i rjes su smra ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: des de'i rjes su smra ba ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not a response to it.

original: kho bo cag gis thams cad thog mar brjod par bya zhing phyis sun dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya ba khas blangs pa ni med kyi 'on kyang sun 'byin par byed pa'i tshig gi yul bstan par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: kho bo cag gis thams cad thog mar brjod par bya zhing phyis sun dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya ba khas blangs pa ni med kyi 'on kyang sun 'byin par byed pa'i tshig gi yul bstan par bya ba yin te /
translated: We do not accept that everything must be stated first and then refuted later. However, the object of the words of refutation must be shown.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na ni sun 'byin pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir @350b ro zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na ni sun 'byin pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir @350b ro zhe na /
translated: Otherwise, the refutation would not apply.

original: de lta yin na ni rjes su smra ba med pa spobs pa med pa las logs shig tu tshar gcad par bya ba'i gnas su brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta yin na ni rjes su smra ba med pa spobs pa med pa las logs shig tu tshar gcad par bya ba'i gnas su brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: If that is so, then the absence of a reply should not be stated as a ground for refutation separately from the absence of eloquence,

original: spobs pa med pa nyid kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spobs pa med pa nyid kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is included in the absence of eloquence.

original: lan rtogs pa med pa ni spobs pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: lan rtogs pa med pa ni spobs pa med pa yin te /
translated: The absence of a reply is the absence of eloquence,

original: lan gyi yul ma bstan pa na yang /
analyzed: lan gyi yul ma bstan pa na yang /
translated: because when the object of the reply is not stated,

original: lan bstan par nus pa ma yin no //üîΩlan rtogs pa med pa /
analyzed: lan bstan par nus pa ma yin no // lan rtogs pa med pa /
translated: it is not possible to state a reply.

original: 'dren pa ma yin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dren pa ma yin pa ma yin te /
translated: The absence of a reply is not the absence of a guide,üîΩbecause it is not possible to state a reply without understanding it.

original: de bas na rjes su smra ba med pa'i khyad par byed pa'i spobs pa med par tshar gcad pa'i gnas su brjod pas /
analyzed: de bas na rjes su smra ba med pa'i khyad par byed pa'i spobs pa med par tshar gcad pa'i gnas su brjod pas /
translated: Therefore, the absence of a reply is stated as a ground for refutation separately from the absence of eloquence,

original: rjes su smra ba med pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: rjes su smra ba med pa nyid yin te /
translated: because the absence of a reply is the absence of eloquence.

original: ba lang la brjed pa bzhin du lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i khra bo nyid do //
analyzed: ba lang la brjed pa bzhin du lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i khra bo nyid do //
translated: Just as a variegated cow is said to have a dewlap, etc.

original: de'i phyir spobs pa med pa nyid tshar gcad pa'i gnas nyid yin par brjod par bya ba'i rjes su smra ba med pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir spobs pa med pa nyid tshar gcad pa'i gnas nyid yin par brjod par bya ba'i rjes su smra ba med pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the absence of eloquence is a ground for defeat, but not the absence of a subsequent statement.

original: lan gsum brjod pa la rjes su smra ba med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i brda'i nges pa 'di sus byas /
analyzed: lan gsum brjod pa la rjes su smra ba med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i brda'i nges pa 'di sus byas /
translated: Who has established this convention that one is defeated if one does not make a subsequent statement after the third announcement?

original: gal te re zhig gzhan la bstan par bya ba'i don du 'jug pa la lan gsum brjod par bya ba ci yin /
analyzed: gal te re zhig gzhan la bstan par bya ba'i don du 'jug pa la lan gsum brjod par bya ba ci yin /
translated: If one engages in debate for the sake of teaching others, why is there a need for three announcements?

original: ji ltar 'dis rtogs par 'gyur ba de ltar de gzung bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dis rtogs par 'gyur ba de ltar de gzung bar bya ba yin no //
translated: One should grasp the opponent‚Äôs position in whatever way one understands it.

original: gal te gzhan nye bar gdung bar byed pa'i don yin na yang ci'i phyir lan gsum rjod par byed /
analyzed: gal te gzhan nye bar gdung bar byed pa'i don yin na yang ci'i phyir lan gsum rjod par byed /
translated: If the purpose is to torment the opponent, why make three announcements?

original: dbang po dag gi rna ba la gshub  pa dang / dka' bas rtogs pa med pa myur ba mdor bsdus pa la sogs phyir rgol ba la nye bar 'tshe bar bya ste /
analyzed: dbang po dag gi rna ba la gshub  pa dang / dka' bas rtogs pa med pa myur ba mdor bsdus pa la sogs phyir rgol ba la nye bar 'tshe bar bya ste /
translated: One should torment the opponent by speaking quickly, in a low voice, and so on, so that the opponent cannot understand.

original: 'di ltar lan rtogs par byed pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar lan rtogs par byed pa /
translated: For if the opponent understands the response,

original: rmongs pas mi smra bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rmongs pas mi smra bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: he will not remain silent out of confusion.

original: gzhan nye ba ra gdung bar byed pa'i rim pa rigs pa ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan nye ba ra gdung bar byed pa'i rim pa rigs pa ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is not the slightest reason to torment others.

original: gang gis dri ma can rtogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang / myur du brjod pa bzlog cing lan gsum rjod par byed pa yin te /üîΩgzhan nye bar gdung bar bya ba'i phyir dam pa 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: gang gis dri ma can rtogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang / myur du brjod pa bzlog cing lan gsum rjod par byed pa yin te / gzhan nye bar gdung bar bya ba'i phyir dam pa 'jug pa'am /
translated: He who is not defiled by the fault of not understanding the method of expression and who is not hasty in his speech, should speak three times.üîΩFor the sake of tormenting others, the wise would not engage in debate or compose treatises.

original: bstan bcos byed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang bstan zin to //
analyzed: bstan bcos byed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang bstan zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: de'i phyir ji srid 'dis ma bzung pa de srid du brjod par bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji srid 'dis ma bzung pa de srid du brjod par bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, as long as he does not understand, he should not speak.

original: lan gsum nyid du ma yin te /
analyzed: lan gsum nyid du ma yin te /
translated: But not three times,

original: sngar nyid du 'dzin pa'i nus pa yod pa yongs su bcad pas nus pa med pa gzhan la khong du chud par byas nas dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngar nyid du 'dzin pa'i nus pa yod pa yongs su bcad pas nus pa med pa gzhan la khong du chud par byas nas dor bar bya'o //
translated: because the possibility of understanding is eliminated by the first statement, and the impossibility of understanding is understood in regard to others.

original: don rnam par mi shes pa yang mi shes pa yin te /
analyzed: don rnam par mi shes pa yang mi shes pa yin te /
translated: One who does not understand the meaning is not a knower of the meaning.

original: dbang pos rnam par shes na yang phyir @351a * //
analyzed: dbang pos rnam par shes na yang phyir @351a * //
translated: Even if he understands through the words, he should not speak.

original: rgol bas rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rgol bas rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The opponent‚Äôs consciousness

original: mi shes pa zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: mi shes pa zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas so //
translated: is called ‚Äúignorance.‚Äù This is a basis for refutation.

original: don rnam par mi shes pa de la /
analyzed: don rnam par mi shes pa de la /
translated: One who does not understand the meaning

original: dgag pa smra bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dgag pa smra bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: should not speak in order to refute.

original: de yang rjes su mi smra ba dang 'dra bar spobs pa med pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang rjes su mi smra ba dang 'dra bar spobs pa med pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir /
translated: Because that is included in the absence of eloquence, which is like the absence of a response.

original: brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: It should not be expressed.

original: dper na rjes su smra ba med pa yul ma bstan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dper na rjes su smra ba med pa yul ma bstan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: For example, because the absence of a response is not taught,

original: de la lan khong du chud par mi nus pa lan rtogs pa med pa nyid tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin te /
analyzed: de la lan khong du chud par mi nus pa lan rtogs pa med pa nyid tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin te /
translated: the absence of an understanding of the response is a basis for refutation.

original: lan gyi yul bstan pa'i zhar la 'ongs pa med par rjes su smra ba don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lan gyi yul bstan pa'i zhar la 'ongs pa med par rjes su smra ba don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the absence of a supplement to the teaching of the object of the response is meaningless.

original: de bzhin du mi shes pa nyid kyang lan khong du chud pa med pa nyid tshar gcad pa'i gnas nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi shes pa nyid kyang lan khong du chud pa med pa nyid tshar gcad pa'i gnas nyid do //
translated: In the same way, ignorance is a basis for refutation because it is the absence of an understanding of the response.

original: ji ltar na lan dang lan gyi yul mi shes pa la lan smra bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar na lan dang lan gyi yul mi shes pa la lan smra bar 'gyur /
translated: How could one speak in response when one does not understand the response and the object of the response?

original: yul mi shes pa dang lan mi shes pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas nyid yin te /
analyzed: yul mi shes pa dang lan mi shes pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas nyid yin te /
translated: It is the basis for refuting the ignorance of the object and the ignorance of the reply.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na spobs pa med pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na spobs pa med pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, one would be without eloquence.

original: don nges par gzung ba med pa ni rjes su smra ba med pa yul ma bstan pas lan khong du chud mi nus pa'i phyir /üîΩlan khong du chud pa med de /
analyzed: don nges par gzung ba med pa ni rjes su smra ba med pa yul ma bstan pas lan khong du chud mi nus pa'i phyir / lan khong du chud pa med de /
translated: One who does not grasp the meaning does not have the reply because he is unable to understand the reply without being taught the object.

original: lan dang de'i yul shes pa can la lan khong du chud pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: lan dang de'i yul shes pa can la lan khong du chud pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: One who does not understand the reply does not have the reply because it is impossible for one who knows the reply and its object to not understand the reply.

original: / gnyi ga la yang de'i lan de mi rtogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: / gnyi ga la yang de'i lan de mi rtogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: In both cases, the reason for not understanding the reply is the same.

original: de med pa la lan rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir de dag tha dad pa'i tshig yod na /
analyzed: de med pa la lan rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir de dag tha dad pa'i tshig yod na /
translated: If the reply is understood in the absence of that, then if the words are different,

original: spobs pa med pa'i yul gang yin zhes brjod par bya zhing /
analyzed: spobs pa med pa'i yul gang yin zhes brjod par bya zhing /
translated: it should be said that the object of the reply is different.

original: yul med pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yul med pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But because it is without an object,

original: brjod par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro /
translated: it is not to be expressed.

original: lan mi shes pa ni mi shes pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: lan mi shes pa ni mi shes pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Ignorance of the reply is not ignorance,

original: 'on kyang yul mi shes pa mi shes pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang yul mi shes pa mi shes pa yin te /
translated: but rather ignorance of the object is ignorance.

original: yul shes pa la lan shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul shes pa la lan shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object is not the response to the knowledge.

original: de rtogs pa med pa'i phyir spobs pa med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de rtogs pa med pa'i phyir spobs pa med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is the non-understanding of that, then it is the absence of ready speech.

original: de ltar yin na ni rjes su smra ba med pa'i yul med pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yin na ni rjes su smra ba med pa'i yul med pa yin te /
translated: If that is so, then the absence of ready speech is not a separate object,

original: mi shes pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //üîΩyul yang dag par khong du chud pa su zhig rjes su smra ba med pa des na rjes su smra ba med pa logs shig tu brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: mi shes pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro // yul yang dag par khong du chud pa su zhig rjes su smra ba med pa des na rjes su smra ba med pa logs shig tu brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: because it is included in the non-understanding.üîΩWhat person understands the object?

original: lan mi shes pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lan mi shes pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the absence of ready speech should not be stated separately, because it is included in the non-understanding.

original: yul mi shes pa nyid kyis lan mi shes pa yang @351b nang du 'dus ba yin te /
analyzed: yul mi shes pa nyid kyis lan mi shes pa yang @351b nang du 'dus ba yin te /
translated: The non-understanding of the response is included in the non-understanding of the object,

original: yul shes pa med par lan shes pa med pas spobs pa med pa nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yul shes pa med par lan shes pa med pas spobs pa med pa nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: because the understanding of the response is not without the understanding of the object.

original: gal te yul shes pa yod na yang /
analyzed: gal te yul shes pa yod na yang /
translated: If the understanding of the object exists,

original: lan shes pa med na yang spobs pa med pa'i yul yin no zhe na /
analyzed: lan shes pa med na yang spobs pa med pa'i yul yin no zhe na /
translated: but the understanding of the response does not exist, then it is the object of the absence of ready speech.

original: de lta na yang yul dang lan mi shes ba dag gi rab tu dbye ba yang tshar gcad pa'i gnas gzhan du brjod na /
analyzed: de lta na yang yul dang lan mi shes ba dag gi rab tu dbye ba yang tshar gcad pa'i gnas gzhan du brjod na /
translated: However, if one were to state the other grounds for refutation in terms of those who do not know the object and the reply,

original: dper na mi shes pa la yul mi shes pa dang / lan mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu dbye ba la yon tan gyi khyad par med na tshar gcad pa'i gnas gzhan du bzhag pa yin na /
analyzed: dper na mi shes pa la yul mi shes pa dang / lan mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu dbye ba la yon tan gyi khyad par med na tshar gcad pa'i gnas gzhan du bzhag pa yin na /
translated: for example, in terms of the divisions of not knowing the object and not knowing the reply, there would be no difference in their qualities, so they would be placed in the other grounds for refutation.

original: de ltar mi shes pa dag la yang /
analyzed: de ltar mi shes pa dag la yang /
translated: However, even in terms of those who do not know,

original: thams cad mi shes pa dang / phyed mi shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rab kyang med la /
analyzed: thams cad mi shes pa dang / phyed mi shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rab kyang med la /
translated: there is no division such as not knowing everything and not knowing half.

original: yon tan ni yod par gyur pa'i phyir 'dus par gnyig yang mi shes par 'dus par brjod pa la skyon cung zad kyang med la /
analyzed: yon tan ni yod par gyur pa'i phyir 'dus par gnyig yang mi shes par 'dus par brjod pa la skyon cung zad kyang med la /
translated: Since there is no fault in stating that both are included in not knowing,

original: yon tan ni yod par gyur pa'i phyir 'dus par brjod par rigs pa yin no//
analyzed: yon tan ni yod par gyur pa'i phyir 'dus par brjod par rigs pa yin no//
translated: it is reasonable to state that they are included in not knowing.

original: de'i phyir rjes su brjod pa med pa mi shes pa dag ni spobs pa med pa'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su brjod pa med pa mi shes pa dag ni spobs pa med pa'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since those who do not know are the object of lack of eloquence due to the absence of a reply,

original: logs shig tu ma brjod de /
analyzed: logs shig tu ma brjod de /
translated: It is not stated separately.

original: gzhan yang phyogs snga ma dang phyi ma'i rgol ba dag gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dang / spobs pa med pa dag las gzhan tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin pa la rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang phyogs snga ma dang phyi ma'i rgol ba dag gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dang / spobs pa med pa dag las gzhan tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin pa la rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, the former and latter opponents are not logical grounds for refutation other than fallacious reasons and lack of confidence.

original: de gnyi ga'i tshig nyid kyis thams cad bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de gnyi ga'i tshig nyid kyis thams cad bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Because both of those words themselves teach everything,

original: de gnyi gar 'dus pa'i rab tu dbye ba yod na yon tan gyi khyad par med pa'i tshig las shin tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de gnyi gar 'dus pa'i rab tu dbye ba yod na yon tan gyi khyad par med pa'i tshig las shin tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: if there is a division included in both of those, it is utterly untenable because there is no difference in the qualities of the words.

original: rab tu spros pa don med yin no //
analyzed: rab tu spros pa don med yin no //
translated: Therefore, extensive elaboration is pointless.
